slash.name: Basic Slash
slash.description: A quick slash with a weapon.

basic_slash.name: Basic Slash
basic_slash.description: A quick slash with your weapon.

block.name: Block
block.description: Puts your shield where it should be, increasing armor briefly.

quickStep.name: Quick Step

effects.description: A short burst of speed decreasing cooldowns.

quickStep.description: Take a quick step to increase speed briefly.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: A last resort. But it makes them bleed.

shieldBash.name: Shield Bash
shieldBash.description: Bashes the target with a shield, dealing damage and has a chance to stun.

battleCry.name: Battle Cry
battleCry.description: Lets out a battle cry that increases the damage of all allies.

throwRock.name: Throw Rock
throwRock.description: Throws a rock at the enemy, dealing physical damage.

swingTorch.name: Swing Torch
swingTorch.description: Swings a torch to deal damage and potentially burn the enemy.

blindWithTorch.name: Blind with Torch
blindWithTorch.description: Uses the torch to blind the enemy, reducing their accuracy.

hum.name: Hum
hum.description: Hums a tune to increase the user's accuracy temporarily.

healingWave.name: Healing Wave
healingWave.description: Heals an ally with a wave of restorative magic.

totemOfStrength.name: Totem of Strength
totemOfStrength.description: Places a totem that increases the strength of all allies in range.

mysticShield.name: Mystic Shield
mysticShield.description: Casts a protective shield that increases the armor of an ally.

healingTouch.name: Healing Touch
healingTouch.description: Heals an ally with a gentle touch.

quickStrike.name: Quick Strike
quickStrike.description: A rapid attack with a dagger.

poisonDart.name: Poison Dart
poisonDart.description: Shoots a poison dart that deals damage over time.

sneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
sneakAttack.description: A stealthy attack that deals high damage and can stun the target.

acidFlask.name: Acid Flask
acidFlask.description: Throws an acid flask that deals damage and reduces the target's armor.

poisonCloud.name: Poison Cloud
poisonCloud.description: Creates a cloud of poison that deals damage over time to all enemies in range.

paralyzingPotion.name: Paralyzing Potion
paralyzingPotion.description: Throws a potion that has a chance to stun the target.

weakeningElixir.name: Weakening Elixir
weakeningElixir.description: Throws an elixir that reduces the target's strength.

toxicBomb.name: Toxic Bomb
toxicBomb.description: Throws a bomb that deals damage and reduces the target's dodge chance.

fireBlast.name: Fire Blast
fireBlast.description: Unleashes a blast of fire that deals damage and may cause burn.

wildfire.name: Wildfire
wildfire.description: Spreads fire that deals damage over time to all enemies and has a chance to spread to allies.

flameWave.name: Flame Wave
flameWave.description: A wave of flame that deals damage to all enemies in range and may hit allies.

explosivePotion.name: Explosive Potion
explosivePotion.description: Throws an explosive potion that deals massive damage and stuns, but can backfire.

poisonArrow.name: Poison Arrow
poisonArrow.description: Shoots a poisoned arrow that deals damage over time.

multiShot.name: Multi-Shot
multiShot.description: Fires multiple arrows at once, hitting multiple enemies.

explosiveArrow.name: Explosive Arrow
explosiveArrow.description: Shoots an explosive arrow that deals fire damage and may cause burn.

piercingShot.name: Piercing Shot
piercingShot.description: Fires an arrow that pierces through armor, reducing its effectiveness.

callOfTheWild.name: Call of the Wild
callOfTheWild.description: Summons a beast to fight alongside the Goblin Beastmaster.

savageStrike.name: Savage Strike
savageStrike.description: Commands a beast to strike, causing damage and bleeding.

packLeader.name: Pack Leader
packLeader.description: Increases the damage of all allied beasts.

ferociousRoar.name: Ferocious Roar
ferociousRoar.description: Unleashes a roar that reduces the armor of all enemies.

berserkSlash.name: Berserk Slash
berserkSlash.description: A furious slash that causes bleeding.

rageStrike.name: Rage Strike
rageStrike.description: A powerful strike fueled by rage, dealing significant damage.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Increases attack speed and damage for a short duration.

warCry.name: War Cry
warCry.description: A mighty war cry that reduces the damage of all enemies.

chieftainsStrike.name: Chieftains Strike
chieftainsStrike.description: A powerful strike that deals significant damage.

goblinsRally.name: Goblins Rally
goblinsRally.description: Rallies all goblins, increasing their damage output.

commandingPresence.name: Commanding Presence
commandingPresence.description: Increases the armor of all allied goblins.

battleRoar.name: Battle Roar
battleRoar.description: A mighty roar that reduces the damage of all enemies.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: The wolf lets out a powerful howl, increasing the armor of all nearby allies.

packHunt.name: Pack Hunt
packHunt.description: The wolf calls its pack to hunt down the target, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

savageBite.name: Savage Bite
savageBite.description: A nasty bite that aims to make the target bleed.

swiftPounce.name: Swift Pounce
swiftPounce.description: The wolf pounces on the target, dealing damage and stunning them briefly.

furiousCharge.name: Furious Charge
furiousCharge.description: The wolf charges at its target with great force.

primalRage.name: Primal Rage
primalRage.description: The wolf enters a primal rage, increasing its damage for a short period.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: A surprise attack dealing extra damage and causing bleeding.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Become invisible for a short duration, increasing damage and critical chance of the next attack.

effects.name: Stealthed
effects.description: Invisible. Next attack deals +25% damage and has +10% crit chance.

throwingKnife.name: Throwing Knife
throwingKnife.description: Quickly throws a sharp knife at a foe.

smokeBomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smokeBomb.description: Blinds all enemies in the area.

poisonDagger.name: Poison Dagger
poisonDagger.description: Deals damage and poisons the target.

shadowStep.name: Shadow Step
shadowStep.description: Step through shadows to appear behind an enemy, dealing minor Shadow damage and preparing for a follow-up.

effects.name: Shadow Vantaged
effects.description: Your next melee attack against this target has +15% crit chance.

aimedShot.name: Aimed Shot
aimedShot.description: A carefully aimed shot that deals significant damage.

quickShot.name: Quick Shot
quickShot.description: A quick shot that deals moderate damage.

piercingArrow.name: Piercing Arrow
piercingArrow.description: An arrow that pierces through multiple enemies.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.description: Fires multiple arrows at once, hitting several enemies.

arrowRain.name: Arrow Rain
arrowRain.description: Releases a barrage of arrows, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

trickShot.name: Trick Shot
trickShot.description: A skillful shot that increases the archer's dodge chance.

viciousBite.name: Vicious Bite
viciousBite.description: A nasty bite that aims to make the target bleed.

scurry.name: Scurry
scurry.description: A quick dash to avoid attacks.

wildSwing.name: Wild Swing
wildSwing.description: A clumsy but forceful swing with a scavenged weapon.

erraticMovement.name: Erratic Movement
erraticMovement.description: Unpredictable movement makes the scavenger harder to hit.

desperateLunge.name: Desperate Lunge
desperateLunge.description: A reckless, powerful attack that leaves the scavenger exposed.

plantSpit.name: Plant Spit
plantSpit.description: Spits a glob of psychoactive plant matter, attempting to disorient.

energyBolt.name: Energy Bolt
energyBolt.description: Fires a bolt of crackling arcane energy.

stoneSlam.name: Stone Slam
stoneSlam.description: Slams a heavy stone limb into the target with concussive force.

fortifiedPlating.name: Fortified Plating
fortifiedPlating.description: Activates reinforced plating, significantly increasing armor.

mistBolt.name: Mist Bolt
mistBolt.description: Conjures a bolt of condensed fog that deals damage and clouds the target's vision.

etherealShift.name: Ethereal Shift
etherealShift.description: Phases partially into the ethereal plane, becoming harder to hit.

boneRattle.name: Bone Rattle
boneRattle.description: Clatters its bones menacingly, reducing enemy accuracy.

undeadResolve.name: Undead Resolve
undeadResolve.description: Hardens its skeletal form, increasing armor temporarily.

boneArrow.name: Bone Arrow
boneArrow.description: Fires a sharpened bone arrow that causes bleeding.

boneSpear.name: Bone Spear
boneSpear.description: Hurls a massive bone spear, piercing armor and dealing heavy damage.

deathPulse.name: Death Pulse
deathPulse.description: Emits a pulse of necromantic energy, weakening enemies.

necromanticRegeneration.name: Necromantic Regeneration
necromanticRegeneration.description: Channels necromantic energy to restore vitality.

electrifiedFlames.name: Electrified Flames

effects.name: Electrocuted Flames
effects.description: Target burns with electrical energy.
Target becomes more vulnerable to Fire.

electrifiedFlames.description: Engulfs a target in flames charged with crackling electricity, dealing Fire damage, continuous Lightning damage, and making them vulnerable to Fire.

thunderousCombustion.name: Thunderous Combustion

effects.description: The explosion has a chance to briefly stun affected enemies.
Enemies caught in the blast are shocked, reducing their accuracy.

thunderousCombustion.description: Ignites the air with a thunderous explosion of fire and lightning, damaging all enemies in an area and potentially stunning or disorienting them.

ballLightningFire.name: Ball Lightning Fire

effects.description: Has a chance to ignite enemies it hits.

ballLightningFire.description: Conjures a volatile sphere of crackling lightning and fire that moves towards enemies, exploding to deal AoE Lightning damage and potentially igniting them.

voltaicOverload.name: Voltaic Overload

effects.description: Overcharges magical circuits, causing the next Fire or Lightning spell to be a guaranteed critical hit with increased damage, but also increases its mana cost slightly.

voltaicOverload.description: Temporarily overcharges arcane energies. The next Fire or Lightning spell cast will be a guaranteed critical hit with amplified power, at a slightly increased mana cost.

conduitOfPower.name: Conduit of Power
conduitOfPower.description: Transforms the caster into a living conduit of elemental fury for a short duration, greatly increasing Fire and Lightning damage dealt and mana regeneration, but also making them more susceptible to incoming damage.

steamBlast.name: Steam Blast

effects.name: Scalded
effects.description: Target is scalded, suffering minor continuous damage and reduced accuracy.

steamBlast.description: Unleashes a focused blast of superheated steam, dealing Steam damage and scalding the target, reducing their accuracy.

scaldingMist.name: Scalding Mist
scaldingMist.description: Conjures a cloud of scalding mist that damages enemies over time and reduces their accuracy while they remain within it.

boilingGeyser.name: Boiling Geyser
boilingGeyser.description: Summons a geyser of boiling water and steam to erupt beneath a target, dealing massive Steam damage with a chance to knock them up and apply a severe scald.

superheatedCloud.name: Superheated Cloud
superheatedCloud.description: Creates a large cloud of superheated steam, dealing initial Fire damage, continuous Steam damage, and reducing the armor of enemies within.

flashBoil.name: Flash Boil
flashBoil.description: Instantly vaporizes nearby moisture into a burst of scalding steam around a target, dealing Steam damage and disorienting foes. More effective on wet targets.

pressureCook.name: Pressure Cook

effects.name: Pressurized
effects.description: Target is internally pressurized. Will explode after a short duration or if hit by a Fire spell.

pressureCook.description: Applies intense internal pressure to a target. After a short delay, or if the target is struck by a Fire spell, they erupt for massive Steam damage.

vaporize.name: Vaporize
vaporize.description: Briefly transforms the caster into a cloud of vapor, significantly increasing dodge chance and resistance to Fire and Water based attacks.

thermalCurrent.name: Thermal Current
thermalCurrent.description: Summons a powerful thermal current that pulls enemies together, dealing initial Steam damage and creating a lingering vortex of superheated air that continuously damages and slows foes.

runeOfBurning.name: Rune of Burning
runeOfBurning.description: Inscribes a powerful rune on the ground that erupts in flames when an enemy approaches or after a short time, dealing Fire damage and burning foes in an area.

explosiveGlyph.name: Explosive Glyph

effects.name: Explosive Glyph
effects.description: An explosive glyph is attached, detonating after a short delay.

explosiveGlyph.description: Attaches a volatile glyph to a target that detonates after a short delay, dealing significant Fire damage.

fireRuneTrap.name: Fire Rune Trap
fireRuneTrap.description: Sets a cunning rune trap. When triggered by an enemy, it erupts into a field of searing flames that continuously damages and slows foes within.

empowerWithRunesFire.name: Empower with Runes (Fire)
empowerWithRunesFire.description: Inscribes temporary runes of power, enhancing the damage and secondary effects of Fire spells for a short duration.

wallOfRunicFire.name: Wall of Runic Fire
wallOfRunicFire.description: Summons a searing wall of fire, etched with debilitating runes. Enemies passing through suffer Fire damage and are burned.

chainRuneBlast.name: Chain Rune Blast
chainRuneBlast.description: Launches a volatile rune that explodes on impact and chains to nearby enemies, dealing Fire damage. Chains are more potent against targets already burning or marked by other runes.

runeOfImmolation.name: Rune of Immolation
runeOfImmolation.description: The caster inscribes a powerful rune upon themselves that pulses waves of intense fire, damaging and burning all nearby enemies for a short duration.

decipherFlameRune.name: Decipher Flame Rune
decipherFlameRune.description: Channels profound runic knowledge, dramatically increasing Fire spell power and efficiency, while also empowering any active Fire Runes on the field for a period.

bloodfireBolt.name: Bloodfire Bolt
bloodfireBolt.description: Launches a bolt of fire fueled by life force, dealing Fire damage and cursing the target.

sacrificialPyre.name: Sacrificial Pyre
sacrificialPyre.description: Consumes a significant portion of health to unleash a devastating pyre around the caster, immolating nearby foes.

crimsonInferno.name: Crimson Inferno
crimsonInferno.description: Summons a raging inferno that burns enemies over time. Deaths within the inferno restore a portion of the caster's life force.

lifebloodIgnition.name: Lifeblood Ignition
lifebloodIgnition.description: Ignites your lifeblood, empowering your next Fire spell to deal increased damage and siphon health from its victims.

sanguineCombustion.name: Sanguine Combustion
sanguineCombustion.description: Inflicts a fiery, blood-fueled curse on a target. If the target dies while afflicted, they explode, dealing Fire damage to nearby enemies and healing the caster for each enemy caught in the blast.

drainVitalityFire.name: Drain Vitality (Fire)
drainVitalityFire.description: Channels a beam of fire that drains life from the target, dealing continuous Fire damage and healing the caster.

bloodBoil.name: Blood Boil
bloodBoil.description: Inflicts a horrific curse that causes the target's blood to boil, dealing escalating Fire damage over time. If the target perishes from this effect, they detonate violently.

forbiddenFlame.name: Forbidden Flame
forbiddenFlame.description: Unleashes a cataclysmic blast of forbidden fire, consuming a large portion of your life force to devastate enemies in a wide area and grant temporary invulnerability and immense lifesteal.

soulfireBolt.name: Soulfire Bolt

effects.description: Chance to steal mana.

soulfireBolt.description: Hurls a bolt of accursed flame that sears both body and soul, dealing Fire and Necrotic damage with a chance to siphon mana.

raiseFlamingSkeleton.name: Raise Flaming Skeleton
raiseFlamingSkeleton.description: Summons skeletal warriors wreathed in perpetual fire to fight for the caster.

balefireStream.name: Balefire Stream

effects.description: Reduces healing received by 50%.

balefireStream.description: Channels a destructive stream of baleful energy mixed with fire, damaging the target and reducing healing they receive.

necroticImmolation.name: Necrotic Immolation

effectsInZone.description: Enemies dying in the zone may rise as zombies.

necroticImmolation.description: Engulfs an area in dark flames. Enemies within take continuous Fire damage, and those slain by the flames may rise as temporary undead servants.

consumingFlames.name: Consuming Flames

effects.description: If target dies, gain bonus Necromancy spell power.

consumingFlames.description: Engulfs a single target in intense fire. If the target perishes, their essence fuels your necromantic power temporarily.

animateDeadFire.name: Animate Dead (Fire)
animateDeadFire.description: Reanimates a fallen corpse, imbuing it with unholy fire to create a potent fiery revenant.

soulBlaze.name: Soul Blaze
soulBlaze.description: Unleashes an explosion of soul-searing fire, dealing Fire and Necrotic damage to all enemies in an area and reducing their resistances to both elements.

lichfireAura.name: Lichfire Aura
lichfireAura.description: Wreathes the caster in an aura of chilling lichfire. Continuously damages nearby enemies with Fire and Necrotic energy, slowly heals the caster, and empowers their undead minions.

evasiveManeuver.name: Evasive Maneuver
evasiveManeuver.description: Perform an agile maneuver to temporarily increase dodge chance.

distract.name: Distract
distract.description: Cause a distraction, lowering a target's accuracy and making them more vulnerable to critical hits.

effects.name: Distracted
effects.description: Accuracy -10, Crit Vulnerability +10%.

applyPoison.name: Apply Poison
applyPoison.description: Coat your weapon with a basic poison and strike, dealing minor damage and applying a poison DoT.

effects.name: Basic Poison
effects.description: Deals Poison damage over time.

dirtyTrick.name: Dirty Trick
dirtyTrick.description: A cunning, underhanded move that deals minor damage and has a chance to stun the target.

shieldBlock.name: Shield Block
shieldBlock.description: Raise your shield, significantly increasing block chance and armor for a short duration.

effects.name: Blocking
effects.description: Increased Block Chance and Armor.

powerStrike.name: Power Strike
powerStrike.description: A mighty blow that deals high physical damage.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Charge at an enemy, dealing minor damage and potentially stunning them.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Swing your weapon in a wide arc, hitting up to 2 enemies in front.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Provoke an enemy, forcing them to attack you for a short duration and increasing your threat.

effects.name: Taunted
effects.description: Must attack the taunter.

defensiveStance.name: Defensive Stance
defensiveStance.description: Adopt a defensive posture, increasing armor and block chance but slightly reducing damage output.

effects.name: Defensive Stance
effects.description: Armor +10, Block Chance +10%, Damage Dealt -10%.

rendArmor.name: Rend Armor
rendArmor.description: A vicious strike aimed to damage and weaken the target's armor.

effects.name: Armor Rended
effects.description: Armor reduced by 15%.

arcaneBolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcaneBolt.description: Hurl a bolt of pure arcane energy at an enemy.

manaShield.name: Mana Shield
manaShield.description: Create a shield of mana that absorbs a portion of incoming damage, draining mana instead of health.

effects.name: Mana Shield
effects.description: Absorbs 50% of damage taken as Mana loss.

magicMissile.name: Magic Missile
magicMissile.description: Launch three missiles of magical energy that unerringly strike their target(s).

elementalBoltFire.name: Elemental Bolt (Fire)
elementalBoltFire.description: Launch a bolt of fire, dealing Fire damage and has a small chance to burn.

elementalBoltIce.name: Elemental Bolt (Ice)
elementalBoltIce.description: Launch a bolt of ice, dealing Ice damage and has a small chance to chill, reducing speed.

effects.name: Chilled
effects.description: Movement speed reduced.

teleportShort.name: Teleport (Short)
teleportShort.description: Instantly teleport a short distance, gaining a momentary increase in dodge.

effects.name: Phased
effects.description: +50 Dodge for next incoming attack this turn.

arcaneIntellectBuff.name: Arcane Intellect
arcaneIntellectBuff.description: Temporarily boost the Magic Power of an ally or self.

effects.name: Arcane Intellect
effects.description: Magic Power increased.

conjureRefreshment.name: Conjure Refreshment
conjureRefreshment.description: Conjure magical food and water, restoring a small amount of mana to the caster.

minorHeal.name: Minor Heal
minorHeal.description: A quick prayer to mend minor wounds.

smiteEvil.name: Smite Evil
smiteEvil.description: Call down holy energy to strike an unholy foe, dealing bonus damage to Undead or Demon types.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Bestow a divine blessing upon an ally, increasing their accuracy and damage slightly.

effects.name: Blessed
effects.description: Accuracy and Damage increased.

cureWounds.name: Cure Wounds
cureWounds.description: A focused prayer that mends moderate wounds and removes a minor poison or bleed effect.

holyLight.name: Holy Light
holyLight.description: Emit a burst of holy light, damaging nearby enemies and healing nearby allies.

turnUndead.name: Turn Undead
turnUndead.description: Channel divine power to repel or damage Undead creatures, causing them to flee or suffer extra damage.

effects.name: Feared
effects.description: Chance to flee or skip turn.

prayerOfFortitude.name: Prayer of Fortitude
prayerOfFortitude.description: A divine prayer that bolsters the vitality of all allies, increasing their maximum health temporarily.

effects.name: Fortitude
effects.description: Maximum Health increased.

divineProtection.name: Divine Protection
divineProtection.description: Shield an ally with divine energy, reducing incoming damage for a short time.

effects.name: Divine Protection
effects.description: Reduces damage taken.

daggerThrust.name: Dagger Thrust
daggerThrust.description: A precise thrust with a dagger, dealing moderate damage with increased critical chance.

twinStrikeDagger.name: Twin Strike
twinStrikeDagger.description: Quickly strike twice with daggers. Each hit has a chance to apply bleed.

shadowStrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowStrike.description: Strike from the shadows, dealing Shadow damage. Deals significantly more damage if used from Stealth.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.description: A vicious finishing move that deals massive damage, especially to bleeding or low health targets.

poisonedBlade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisonedBlade.description: Strike with a poisoned dagger, dealing damage and applying a more potent poison.

effects.name: Virulent Poison
effects.description: Deals potent Poison damage over time.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurl a sphere of fire that explodes on impact, dealing Fire damage to the target and minor splash damage to adjacent enemies.

flameWall.name: Flame Wall
flameWall.description: Summon a wall of fire that damages enemies who pass through it or stand within it.

immolate.name: Immolate
immolate.description: Engulf a target in magical flames, dealing initial Fire damage and significant burning damage over time.

fireBlastMage.name: Fire Blast
fireBlastMage.description: A concentrated blast of fire dealing high damage. Has a chance to knock back the target.

holyFire.name: Holy Fire
holyFire.description: Engulf a target in holy fire, dealing initial Holy damage and burning them with sacred flames.

divineJudgment.name: Divine Judgment
divineJudgment.description: Call down a pillar of divine judgment, smiting a foe for massive Holy damage. Deals more damage to targets with negative status effects.

righteousFury.name: Righteous Fury
righteousFury.description: Enter a state of righteous fury, increasing your Holy damage and critical strike chance for a short period.

effects.name: Righteous Fury
effects.description: Holy Damage and Crit Chance increased.

shadowstrikeCrit.name: Shadowstrike
shadowstrikeCrit.description: Strike from the deepest shadows, dealing high Shadow damage. Guaranteed critical hit if used from Stealth, and applies a potent Bleed.

vitalsTargeting.name: Vitals Targeting
vitalsTargeting.description: Focus intensely, your next few dagger attacks have a vastly increased critical hit chance and ignore a portion of enemy armor.

effects.name: Vitals Targeted
effects.description: Crit Chance +50%, Armor Penetration +25% for next 2 Dagger attacks.

deathMark.name: Death Mark
deathMark.description: Mark an enemy for death. For a duration, all critical hits against the target by anyone deal bonus Shadow damage. If the target dies while marked, you regain some stamina and mana.

effects.name: Death Marked
effects.description: Critical hits against this target deal +15 Shadow damage.

lavaBurst.name: Lava Burst
lavaBurst.description: Hurl a glob of molten rock that explodes, dealing Fire damage to the target and splash Earth damage to nearby foes. Leaves a small patch of molten ground.

moltenShield.name: Molten Shield
moltenShield.description: Encase an ally (or self) in a shield of cooling magma, granting significant armor and Fire resistance, and damaging melee attackers with heat.

effects.name: Molten Shield
effects.description: Armor and Fire Res increased. Damages melee attackers.

volcanicEruption.name: Volcanic Eruption
volcanicEruption.description: Cause a targeted area to erupt like a small volcano, spewing lava and rock. Deals AoE Fire and Earth damage and creates a large area of difficult, burning terrain.

magmaGolemSummon.name: Summon Magma Golem
magmaGolemSummon.description: Summon a formidable Magma Golem to fight by your side. The golem is resilient and burns nearby enemies.

plasmaBolt.name: Plasma Bolt

effects.name: Plasma Burn
effects.description: Target is burning with plasma, increasing damage taken from Lightning.

plasmaBolt.description: Hurls a volatile bolt of plasma, dealing Fire damage and additional Lightning damage, and leaving the target susceptible to further Lightning damage.

lightningFirestorm.name: Lightning Firestorm
lightningFirestorm.description: Calls down a chaotic storm of fire and lightning in an area, dealing initial Fire damage and then continuous Fire and intermittent Lightning damage to enemies within.

staticInferno.name: Static Inferno

effects.name: Static Inferno
effects.description: Nearby enemies are periodically zapped for Lightning damage. Your Fire spells have a chance to arc lightning.

staticInferno.description: Wreathes the caster in an aura of static electricity and embers. Periodically zaps nearby enemies and grants your Fire spells a chance to arc lightning to another foe.

blessedHealingWave.name: Blessed Healing Wave

effects.name: Minor Fortitude
effects.description: Target's Vitality increased slightly.

blessedHealingWave.description: A powerful wave of healing energy that also bestows a minor blessing of fortitude.

circleOfBenevolence.name: Circle of Benevolence

effects.name: Protective Blessing
effects.description: Armor increased for allies in the circle.

circleOfBenevolence.description: Channels a soothing circle of divine energy, healing all allies within it over time and granting them a protective blessing.

divineRenewal.name: Divine Renewal
divineRenewal.description: Instantly heals a target and applies a potent heal-over-time effect, also attempting to dispel a curse or disease.

auraOfLife.name: Aura of Life
auraOfLife.description: Emanates a powerful aura of life, continuously healing nearby allies and bolstering their resistance to necrotic energies.

cripplingStab.name: Crippling Stab
cripplingStab.description: Stab at a vulnerable point, dealing damage and reducing the target's movement speed and dodge. If used from Stealth, the debuff is stronger.

effects.name: Crippled
effects.description: Movement Speed -25%, Dodge -10.

fanOfDaggers.name: Fan of Daggers
fanOfDaggers.description: Throw a spray of daggers, hitting multiple enemies in a cone in front of you. Each dagger has a chance to apply bleed. More effective if used after an Evasive Maneuver.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Instantly disappear from sight, entering an improved Stealth. Your next attack from this Stealth deals massively increased critical damage and has bonus accuracy. Removes most DoTs.

effects.name: Vanished
effects.description: Invisible. Next attack +100% crit damage, +20 Accuracy.

huntersMark.name: Hunter's Mark
huntersMark.description: Mark a target, increasing all damage they take from you and your allies for a duration. Reveals stealthed targets and makes them more vulnerable to your Bow attacks.

effects.name: Marked
effects.description: Takes 15% increased damage. Bow attacks from caster deal +10% damage.

silentShot.name: Silent Shot
silentShot.description: Fire a carefully aimed shot that deals high damage. If used from Stealth, does not break Stealth, deals bonus damage, and has increased critical chance.

volley.name: Volley
volley.description: Fire a rapid volley of arrows at a designated area, damaging all enemies within. If Hunter's Mark is active on any target in the area, arrows are more likely to hit vitals (bonus crit chance).

twinSlash.name: Twin Slash
twinSlash.description: Rapidly slash twice with your dual-wielded weapons. Each hit has a chance to reduce enemy's accuracy.

effects.name: Unbalanced
effects.description: Accuracy reduced by 5.

bladeFlurry.name: Blade Flurry
bladeFlurry.description: Unleash a flurry of quick strikes, hitting the primary target multiple times or spreading to nearby enemies if the primary target dies.

whirlingSteel.name: Whirling Steel
whirlingSteel.description: Spin in a whirlwind of flashing steel, damaging all nearby enemies and gaining temporary increased dodge.

dualDeflection.name: Dual Deflection
dualDeflection.description: Skillfully use your twin blades to deflect incoming attacks, greatly increasing your block/parry chance for a short time. Successful deflections grant a small speed boost.

effects.name: Deflecting
effects.description: Increased Parry Chance.

effects.name: Swift Deflection
effects.description: Speed increased.

coordinatedAssault.name: Coordinated Assault
coordinatedAssault.description: Strike in concert with an ally. You and a nearby ally both attack the target. Your combined damage is increased if the target is debuffed.

riposteDual.name: Dual Riposte
riposteDual.description: After successfully parrying an attack, unleash a swift counter-attack with both weapons.

crossCut.name: Cross Cut
crossCut.description: Deliver a powerful scissor-like strike with both weapons. If the target is bleeding, this attack deals critical damage.

danceOfBlades.name: Dance of Blades
danceOfBlades.description: Enter a fluid combat dance for a duration, increasing attack speed, dodge, and causing your dual-wield attacks to occasionally strike an additional nearby enemy.

effects.name: Blade Dancer
effects.description: Attack Speed and Dodge increased. Dual Wield attacks may cleave.

preciseSlashOneHand.name: Precise Slash
preciseSlashOneHand.description: A carefully aimed slash with your one-handed weapon, boasting higher accuracy and critical hit chance.

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: After a successful parry, deliver a swift and damaging counter-attack.

bladeDanceOneHand.name: Blade Dance
bladeDanceOneHand.description: Execute a series of rapid slashes against a single target, or an adjacent one if the primary is defeated. Each hit slightly increases your dodge.

disarmingStrike.name: Disarming Strike
disarmingStrike.description: Attempt to disarm your opponent, dealing damage and having a chance to reduce their damage output significantly for a short time.

effects.name: Disarmed
effects.description: Damage Dealt -30%.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: Make a deceptive move, dealing minor damage and forcing the enemy to lower their guard, reducing their block chance.

effects.name: Feinted
effects.description: Block Chance -20%.

challengeDuel.name: Challenge to Duel
challengeDuel.description: Challenge an enemy to a duel. For the duration, you deal increased damage to them and they deal reduced damage to your allies.

effects.name: Duelist's Focus
effects.description: Deal +20% damage to the challenged target.

effects.name: Challenged
effects.description: Deals -20% damage to targets other than the challenger.

honedEdge.name: Honed Edge
honedEdge.description: Carefully hone your blade, granting your next few one-handed attacks increased damage and armor penetration.

effects.name: Honed Edge
effects.description: Increased damage and armor penetration for next 3 One-Handed attacks.

warriorsResolve.name: Warrior's Resolve
warriorsResolve.description: Steel your resolve, becoming highly resistant to stuns and fear effects and gaining a temporary boost to vitality.

effects.name: Resolved
effects.description: Increased Vitality and resistance to Stun/Fear.

guardAlly.name: Guard Ally
guardAlly.description: Protect a chosen ally, redirecting a portion of the damage they would take to yourself and increasing their armor.

effects.name: Guarded
effects.description: Armor increased. Damage redirected.

effects.name: Guardian
effects.description: Taking redirected damage.

phalanxFormation.name: Phalanx Formation
phalanxFormation.description: Form a defensive line with nearby allies. You and adjacent allies gain increased armor and block chance. Movement is restricted.

effects.name: Phalanx
effects.description: Armor and Block Chance increased. Movement restricted.

shieldWall.name: Shield Wall
shieldWall.description: Become an immovable bastion, massively increasing your block chance and damage reduction from the front but reducing your movement and attack speed.

effects.name: Shield Wall
effects.description: Massive Block/DR from front. Slowed.

retaliationStrike.name: Retaliation Strike
retaliationStrike.description: After successfully blocking an attack, immediately strike back at the attacker with your weapon and shield.

holdTheLine.name: Hold the Line
holdTheLine.description: Inspire allies to hold their ground. You and nearby allies become highly resistant to knockback and gain increased stun resistance.

effects.name: Steadfast
effects.description: Resist Knockback and Stuns.

protectorsVow.name: Protector's Vow
protectorsVow.description: Vow to protect an ally. While active, any damage they take below 30% health is significantly reduced, and you gain a burst of healing if they are saved from a fatal blow by this effect.

effects.name: Protector's Vow
effects.description: Damage greatly reduced below 30% HP. Caster healed if saved.

divineShieldBash.name: Divine Shield Bash
divineShieldBash.description: Bash with your shield, infused with holy energy. Deals Blunt and Holy damage, and has a high chance to daze the target, reducing their damage output.

effects.name: Dazed
effects.description: Damage Dealt -20%.

mightyBlow.name: Mighty Blow
mightyBlow.description: A powerful overhead strike with a two-handed weapon, dealing immense damage.

sweepingStrike.name: Sweeping Strike
sweepingStrike.description: Swing your great weapon in a wide arc, hitting multiple enemies in front of you. Higher chance to critically hit if only one target is hit.

earthshakerSlam.name: Earthshaker Slam
earthshakerSlam.description: Slam your weapon into the ground with tremendous force, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and potentially stunning them.

executionersChop.name: Executioner's Chop
executionersChop.description: A devastating blow aimed to finish off a weakened foe. Deals significantly more damage to targets below 30% health.

shatteringBlow.name: Shattering Blow
shatteringBlow.description: A forceful strike that shatters armor, significantly reducing the target's armor for a duration.

effects.name: Armor Shattered
effects.description: Armor reduced by 30%.

brutalCharge.name: Brutal Charge
brutalCharge.description: Charge recklessly at a distant foe, dealing damage and knocking them back. You take minor recoil damage.

indomitableSmash.name: Indomitable Smash
indomitableSmash.description: Gather all your strength for an unstoppable smash. This attack cannot be blocked or parried, and ignores a portion of armor.

battleRush.name: Battle Rush
battleRush.description: Enter a battle frenzy, increasing your movement speed and attack speed temporarily. Your attacks have a chance to daze enemies.

effects.name: Battle Rushed
effects.description: Movement and Attack Speed increased. Attacks may daze.

searingRay.name: Searing Ray
searingRay.description: Focus a beam of intense fire on a target, dealing continuous Fire damage. Each tick reduces the target's Fire resistance.

heatWave.name: Heat Wave
heatWave.description: Release a wave of superheated air, damaging all enemies and reducing their accuracy due to shimmering heat.

effects.name: Heat Haze
effects.description: Accuracy reduced.

combustion.name: Combustion
combustion.description: Cause a burning target to violently combust, dealing AoE Fire damage. Consumes Burn effects on the primary target for bonus damage.

fireShieldSelf.name: Fire Shield
fireShieldSelf.description: Wreathe yourself in a shield of flames, granting Fire resistance and damaging melee attackers.

effects.name: Fire Shield
effects.description: Fire Resistance increased. Damages melee attackers.

stoneFist.name: Stone Fist
stoneFist.description: Summon a fist of rock to strike your foe, dealing Blunt damage with a chance to briefly stun.

earthquakeMinor.name: Minor Earthquake
earthquakeMinor.description: Shake the ground beneath enemies, dealing Blunt damage to all in an area and potentially slowing them.

effects.name: Tremors
effects.description: Movement speed reduced.

earthenArmor.name: Earthen Armor
earthenArmor.description: Cover yourself or an ally in plates of rock, increasing armor and physical resistance.

effects.name: Earthen Armor
effects.description: Armor and Physical Resistance increased.

rockBarrage.name: Rock Barrage
rockBarrage.description: Launch several chunks of rock at a single target, or multiple if only one is available.

stoneSpike.name: Stone Spike
stoneSpike.description: Cause a sharp spike of rock to erupt from the ground beneath an enemy, dealing Pierce damage.

mudSlide.name: Mud Slide
mudSlide.description: Unleash a wave of mud in a line, damaging enemies and heavily slowing them. Creates difficult terrain.

effects.name: Mired
effects.description: Movement speed severely reduced.

earthShieldAlly.name: Earth Shield
earthShieldAlly.description: Grant an ally a shield of swirling earth that absorbs a fixed amount of damage and slightly heals them when it breaks.

tremorSense.name: Tremor Sense
tremorSense.description: Heighten your connection to the earth, allowing you to sense enemy movements. Grants increased accuracy and reveals stealthed enemies in an area.

effects.name: Tremor Sense
effects.description: Increased accuracy.

waterJet.name: Water Jet
waterJet.description: Blast an enemy with a high-pressure jet of water, dealing Water damage with a chance to push them back.

iceShard.name: Ice Shard
iceShard.description: Launch a sharp shard of ice, dealing Ice damage. Applies Chill, reducing target's speed.

effects.name: Chilled
effects.description: Speed reduced.

frostNova.name: Frost Nova
frostNova.description: Release an explosion of frost, damaging all nearby enemies and has a high chance to Freeze them in place.

healingMist.name: Healing Mist
healingMist.description: Channel a soothing mist that heals all allies in an area over time.

tidalPush.name: Tidal Push
tidalPush.description: Summon a wave to push enemies away from you, dealing minor Water damage.

waterWhip.name: Water Whip
waterWhip.description: Lash out with a whip of water. Has a chance to pull a distant enemy closer or disarm a closer one.

aquaticShield.name: Aquatic Shield
aquaticShield.description: Surround an ally (or self) with a shield of swirling water, granting Water and Ice resistance and absorbing some damage.

effects.name: Aquatic Shield
effects.description: Water/Ice Res increased. Absorbs damage.

drench.name: Drench
drench.description: Soak enemies in an area, dealing minor Water damage and making them more vulnerable to Lightning and Ice damage.

effects.name: Drenched
effects.description: Takes +20% damage from Lightning and Ice.

lightningBolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightningBolt.description: Call down a bolt of lightning on a single target, dealing high Lightning damage.

windGust.name: Wind Gust
windGust.description: Summon a strong gust of wind to push enemies in a line, dealing minor Air damage.

cycloneMinor.name: Minor Cyclone
cycloneMinor.description: Conjure a small cyclone that damages and pulls enemies towards its center over a short duration.

shockingGrasp.name: Shocking Grasp
shockingGrasp.description: Deliver a shocking touch, dealing Lightning damage. Increased critical chance against Drenched targets.

thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
thunderclap.description: Create a deafening thunderclap, damaging nearby enemies and has a chance to disorient them, reducing their accuracy and magic control.

effects.name: Disoriented
effects.description: Accuracy and Magic Control reduced.

levitateSelfShort.name: Levitate (Short)
levitateSelfShort.description: Briefly levitate, becoming immune to ground-based effects and increasing dodge chance against melee attacks.

effects.name: Levitating
effects.description: Immune to ground effects. Increased dodge vs melee.

windBarrier.name: Wind Barrier
windBarrier.description: Summon a swirling barrier of wind around an ally (or self) that deflects projectiles and grants Air resistance.

effects.name: Wind Barrier
effects.description: Deflects projectiles. Air Resistance increased.

staticCharge.name: Static Charge
staticCharge.description: Charge yourself or an ally with static electricity. The next melee attack received by the target will discharge, damaging and possibly stunning the attacker.

effects.name: Static Charge
effects.description: Next melee attacker takes Lightning damage and may be stunned.

summonImp.name: Summon Imp
summonImp.description: Summon a mischievous Imp to fight by your side. Imps are fragile but can cast weak fire bolts.

summonSpiritWolf.name: Summon Spirit Wolf
summonSpiritWolf.description: Call forth a loyal Spirit Wolf. It is reasonably durable and can make quick attacks.

empowerSummon.name: Empower Summon
empowerSummon.description: Temporarily empower one of your summoned minions, increasing its damage and health.

effects.name: Empowered
effects.description: Damage and Health increased.

dismissSummon.name: Dismiss Summon
dismissSummon.description: Dismiss one of your summoned minions. Refunds a small amount of mana if the minion had significant remaining duration/health.

summonMinorElemental.name: Summon Minor Elemental
summonMinorElemental.description: Summon a Minor Elemental (Fire, Water, Earth, or Air - chosen randomly or by attunement). It has basic elemental attacks.

planarBindingWeak.name: Planar Binding (Weak)
planarBindingWeak.description: Attempt to bind a weak extraplanar entity to your will for a short time. Chance to fail or summon a hostile entity.

controlMinion.name: Control Minion
controlMinion.description: Direct one of your minions to focus its attacks on a specific enemy.

sacrificeMinionWeak.name: Sacrifice Minion (Weak)
sacrificeMinionWeak.description: Sacrifice one of your weaker minions to restore a moderate amount of mana or cause a small AoE explosion.

arcaneBarrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcaneBarrage.description: Unleash a rapid barrage of arcane missiles. Each missile has a chance to grant you a stack of Arcane Charge, increasing your spell power.

realityShiftMinor.name: Minor Reality Shift
realityShiftMinor.description: Slightly warp reality around a target. Chance to swap their position with another random unit (friend or foe) or briefly confuse them.

effects.name: Confused
effects.description: Chance to attack random target or skip turn.

manaVortexMinor.name: Minor Mana Vortex
manaVortexMinor.description: Create a small vortex of arcane energy that drains mana from enemies within it over time and transfers a portion to you.

spellStealWeak.name: Spell Steal (Weak)
spellStealWeak.description: Attempt to steal a minor beneficial magical effect from an enemy and apply it to yourself. Higher chance to fail against strong magic.

arcaneMissileSwarm.name: Arcane Missile Swarm
arcaneMissileSwarm.description: Launch a devastating swarm of arcane missiles that bombard enemies in a target area.

dispelMagic.name: Dispel Magic
dispelMagic.description: Attempt to remove a magical buff from an enemy or a magical debuff from an ally.

empowerSpell.name: Empower Spell
empowerSpell.description: Focus your arcane energies, causing your next damaging spell to deal significantly increased damage and have a higher critical strike chance.

effects.name: Spell Empowered
effects.description: Next damaging spell +30% Damage, +20% Crit Chance.

arcaneInfusion.name: Arcane Infusion
arcaneInfusion.description: Infuse an ally with arcane energy, temporarily boosting their primary combat stat (Strength, Dexterity, or Magic Power, whichever is highest) and mana regeneration.

effects.name: Arcane Infusion
effects.description: Primary combat stat and Mana Regen increased.

condemn.name: Condemn
condemn.description: Condemn a foe with divine power, dealing Holy damage. If the target is Undead or a Demon, they are also Stunned.

searingLight.name: Searing Light
searingLight.description: Unleash a beam of searing holy light that damages all enemies in a line and reduces their accuracy.

effects.name: Blinded
effects.description: Accuracy reduced.

consecrateGround.name: Consecrate Ground
consecrateGround.description: Consecrate an area with holy energy. Allies within are healed over time and gain bonus armor. Enemies within take Holy damage over time.

divineBolt.name: Divine Bolt
divineBolt.description: A powerful bolt of pure divine energy that smites a single foe.

retributionAura.name: Retribution Aura
retributionAura.description: Activate an aura of retribution. For a duration, a portion of damage dealt to you and nearby allies is reflected back to attackers as Holy damage.

greaterHeal.name: Greater Heal
greaterHeal.description: A potent prayer that significantly mends an ally's wounds.

circleOfHealing.name: Circle of Healing
circleOfHealing.description: Create a circle of healing light that restores health to all allies within it.

renew.name: Renew
renew.description: Imbue an ally with renewing energy, healing them over time for a moderate amount.

purify.name: Purify
purify.description: Cleanse an ally of harmful effects, removing up to two debuffs such as poison, bleed, or curse.

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.description: A powerful healing spell that also grants the target increased resistance to debuffs for a short time.

effects.name: Restored
effects.description: Increased debuff resistance.

divineInterventionMinor.name: Minor Divine Intervention
divineInterventionMinor.description: Call upon divine power to shield an ally from a fatal blow, leaving them at 1 HP instead. Has a long cooldown.

effects.name: Divine Intervention
effects.description: Prevents death once, leaving target at 1 HP.

beaconOfLight.name: Beacon of Light
beaconOfLight.description: Designate an ally as a Beacon of Light. A portion of all healing you do to other targets is also transferred to the Beacon.

effects.name: Beacon of Light
effects.description: Receives a portion of healing done by caster to others.

dispelCurse.name: Dispel Curse
dispelCurse.description: Attempt to lift a malevolent curse from an ally.

removeFear.name: Remove Fear
removeFear.description: Calm an ally's spirit, removing Fear effects and granting temporary resistance to them.

effects.name: Steadfast
effects.description: Increased Fear resistance.

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Create a small area of consecrated ground. Allies within are protected from taking critical hits and regenerate a small amount of health.

guidance.name: Guidance
guidance.description: Provide divine guidance to an ally, increasing their accuracy and critical strike chance for their next few actions.

effects.name: Guided
effects.description: Accuracy and Crit Chance increased for next 2 actions.

wardAgainstEvil.name: Ward Against Evil
wardAgainstEvil.description: Place a protective ward on an ally that grants them increased resistance against Shadow and Necrotic damage.

effects.name: Warded
effects.description: Increased Shadow and Necrotic Resistance.

blessingOfProtection.name: Blessing of Protection
blessingOfProtection.description: Bestow a blessing that significantly increases an ally's armor for a short duration.

effects.name: Protected
effects.description: Armor increased.

blessingOfMight.name: Blessing of Might
blessingOfMight.description: Bestow a blessing that significantly increases an ally's damage output for a short duration.

effects.name: Empowered
effects.description: Damage Dealt increased.

auraOfCourage.name: Aura of Courage
auraOfCourage.description: Inspire courage in nearby allies, granting them increased critical hit chance and resistance to Fear effects.

exploitWeaknessCrit.name: Exploit Weakness
exploitWeaknessCrit.description: A dagger strike aimed at an enemy's weak point. Deals bonus damage and has a higher critical strike chance against targets suffering from debuffs.

venomousCrit.name: Venomous Crit
venomousCrit.description: Strike with a venom-laced dagger. Critical hits with this ability apply a potent, stacking poison that also reduces healing received.

garroteSilence.name: Garrote
garroteSilence.description: Attempt to silence a target with a garrote wire, dealing damage. If used from Stealth, the silence duration is significantly longer.

phantomAssault.name: Phantom Assault
phantomAssault.description: Become a shadowy blur, striking up to three times. Each strike deals Shadow damage and has a chance to apply a 'Mark of the Phantom', increasing critical damage taken by the target.

cloakOfDeception.name: Cloak of Deception
cloakOfDeception.description: Wrap yourself in shadows, becoming stealthed. While this stealth persists, you gain significantly increased critical strike chance and critical damage. Attacking breaks stealth.

effects.name: Deceptive Cloak
effects.description: Stealthed. Crit Chance +40%, Crit Damage +50%.

blurOfStrikes.name: Blur of Strikes
blurOfStrikes.description: Unleash a rapid succession of five dagger strikes against a single target. Each hit slightly reduces the cooldown of your Evasion skills.

rapidStab.name: Rapid Stab
rapidStab.description: A lightning-fast stab. Costs very little stamina and has a very short cooldown.

ghostlyMovement.name: Ghostly Movement
ghostlyMovement.description: Move like a phantom for a short duration, significantly increasing your dodge chance and allowing you to pass through enemies (conceptually, grants bonus to hit back row).

effects.name: Ghostly
effects.description: Dodge +30. Can target back row with melee.

swiftExecution.name: Swift Execution
swiftExecution.description: A blindingly fast series of stabs aimed at a low-health target. If this attack is fatal, its cooldown is significantly reduced.

daggerStorm.name: Dagger Storm
daggerStorm.description: Become a whirlwind of daggers, striking all nearby enemies multiple times with blinding speed. Each hit has a small chance to apply bleed.

quickReflexesBuff.name: Quick Reflexes
quickReflexesBuff.description: Hone your reflexes to an unnatural degree, granting a massive boost to dodge and attack speed for a very short duration.

effects.name: Heightened Reflexes
effects.description: Dodge and Attack Speed greatly increased.

phantomStep.name: Phantom Step
phantomStep.description: Instantly step to a new position (conceptually allowing to switch rows or target back), dealing minor Shadow damage to an enemy near your arrival and gaining a burst of speed.

effects.name: Phantom Speed
effects.description: Movement Speed increased.

thousandCuts.name: Thousand Cuts
thousandCuts.description: A legendary technique: unleash an almost uncountable number of dagger strikes against a single foe. Each hit has a chance to apply a stacking bleed that ignores some armor.

hemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
hemorrhage.description: A vicious strike designed to open a deep, bleeding wound. Applies a strong Bleed effect.

serratedBlade.name: Serrated Blade
serratedBlade.description: Coat your daggers with a substance that makes wounds bleed more profusely. Your next few dagger attacks have a greatly increased chance to apply Bleed, and existing Bleeds deal more damage.

effects.name: Serrated Blades
effects.description: Dagger attacks more likely to Bleed. Bleed damage increased.

bloodletting.name: Bloodletting
bloodletting.description: Exploit an existing bleed on a target, dealing immediate damage based on the remaining bleed damage and refreshing its duration.

exsanguinate.name: Exsanguinate
exsanguinate.description: A brutal attack that causes all Bleed effects on the target to deal their remaining damage instantly. Target becomes more vulnerable to physical damage.

effects.name: Exposed Veins
effects.description: Physical damage taken +20%.

arterialStrike.name: Arterial Strike
arterialStrike.description: A precise stab targeting major arteries. Guaranteed critical hit if the target is already bleeding, and applies an even more severe bleed.

tasteOfBlood.name: Taste of Blood
tasteOfBlood.description: The scent of blood invigorates you. For a short time, your attacks against bleeding targets heal you for a small amount.

effects.name: Blood Frenzy
effects.description: Attacks vs bleeding targets heal for 15% of damage dealt.

crimsonDance.name: Crimson Dance
crimsonDance.description: Perform a deadly dance, striking all nearby enemies. Each enemy hit starts bleeding. Your dodge is increased during the dance.

painMagnification.name: Pain Magnification
painMagnification.description: Amplify the suffering of a bleeding target. For a duration, all damage they take (from any source) is increased.

effects.name: Pain Magnified
effects.description: Damage taken +25%.

envenom.name: Envenom
envenom.description: Strike with daggers coated in concentrated venom, dealing initial damage and applying a potent, stacking poison.

toxicStab.name: Toxic Stab
toxicStab.description: A quick stab with a poisoned blade that also reduces the target's resistance to Poison damage.

effects.name: Poison Vulnerability
effects.description: Poison Resistance -20%.

poisonCloudBurst.name: Poison Cloud Burst
poisonCloudBurst.description: Release a concentrated cloud of toxic gas that damages and poisons all enemies in an area. The poison also reduces healing received.

neurotoxinDart.name: Neurotoxin Dart
neurotoxinDart.description: Fire a dart coated in neurotoxin. Deals minor damage and has a chance to stun or silence the target.

debilitatingPoison.name: Debilitating Poison
debilitatingPoison.description: Apply a special poison to your daggers. Your next dagger attack will inflict a poison that weakens the target, reducing their damage and armor.

effects.name: Debilitating Toxins
effects.description: Next Dagger attack applies a weakening poison.

venomCoating.name: Venom Coating
venomCoating.description: Coat your weapons in a fast-acting venom. Your next few attacks apply a short, intense poison.

effects.name: Venom Coated
effects.description: Next 3 attacks apply Fast Venom.

acidicSplash.name: Acidic Splash
acidicSplash.description: Hurl a vial of acid that splashes, dealing Chemical damage and reducing armor of the primary target and one adjacent enemy.

effects.name: Acid Burn
effects.description: Armor reduced.

poisonTrap.name: Poison Trap
poisonTrap.description: Set a hidden trap that, when triggered, releases a cloud of poison, damaging and poisoning enemies in the vicinity.

acrobaticStrike.name: Acrobatic Strike
acrobaticStrike.description: Perform an agile acrobatic attack, dealing damage and temporarily increasing your dodge chance.

perfectDodgeBuff.name: Perfect Dodge
perfectDodgeBuff.description: Focus your senses, guaranteeing your next dodge. After successfully dodging this way, gain a burst of critical chance.

effects.name: Perfect Dodge Stance
effects.description: Next attack dodged. Gain crit chance after.

windStep.name: Wind Step
windStep.description: Move with the speed of wind to a new location, leaving behind a disorienting blur that reduces accuracy of nearby enemies.

effects.name: Blurred
effects.description: Accuracy reduced.

disengage.name: Disengage
disengage.description: Quickly strike an enemy and leap backwards, creating distance and becoming harder to hit for a moment.

counteringRiposte.name: Countering Riposte
counteringRiposte.description: After successfully dodging a melee attack, unleash a swift, damaging riposte that has increased critical chance.

unseenMovement.name: Unseen Movement
unseenMovement.description: Become nearly invisible while moving for a short duration. Your next attack from this state deals bonus Shadow damage and slows the target.

effects.name: Unseen
effects.description: Nearly invisible. Next attack deals bonus Shadow damage and slows.

flowLikeWind.name: Flow Like Wind
flowLikeWind.description: Enter a state of pure evasion. For a short time, your dodge chance is massively increased, and each successful dodge slightly reduces your active cooldowns.

effects.name: Wind Flow
effects.description: Dodge greatly increased. Dodges reduce cooldowns.

bladeDanceEvasion.name: Evasive Blade Dance
bladeDanceEvasion.description: Perform a dazzling dance of blades, striking multiple nearby enemies. Each hit grants a stacking bonus to your dodge chance for a short duration.

criticalShot.name: Critical Shot
criticalShot.description: A meticulously aimed shot designed to strike a vital point, boasting a very high critical strike chance and bonus critical damage.

headshot.name: Headshot
headshot.description: Attempt a difficult headshot. High damage and critical chance. If it critically hits, it may instantly kill weaker foes or stun stronger ones.

findVitalPoint.name: Find Vital Point
findVitalPoint.description: Study your target, revealing a vital point. Your next attack against this target is a guaranteed critical hit and ignores a portion of their armor.

effects.name: Vital Point Exposed
effects.description: Next attack vs target is a crit and ignores 30% armor.

steadyAimCrit.name: Steady Aim (Crit)
steadyAimCrit.description: Take a moment to steady your aim, greatly increasing the critical strike chance and range of your next bow attack.

effects.name: Steady Aim
effects.description: Next Bow attack +40% Crit Chance, +2 Range.

penetratingCritArrow.name: Penetrating Critical Arrow
penetratingCritArrow.description: Fire an arrow enchanted to pierce armor and strike true. High critical chance, and critical hits ignore a large amount of enemy armor.

longshotMastery.name: Longshot Mastery
longshotMastery.description: Make a shot from extreme range. Deals bonus damage and has increased critical chance the further the target is.

deathFromAfar.name: Death From Afar
deathFromAfar.description: A single, incredibly powerful arrow shot from an unseen distance. Has massively increased critical chance and damage. Requires a turn of preparation (channeling).

focusedShot.name: Focused Shot
focusedShot.description: Spend a moment focusing, then release an arrow that deals high damage and has a higher chance to critically strike.

rapidFire.name: Rapid Fire
rapidFire.description: Quickly fire a burst of four arrows at a single target. Each arrow deals reduced damage but attacks quickly.

arrowStorm.name: Arrow Storm
arrowStorm.description: Unleash a blinding storm of arrows in an area, peppering all enemies within. Each enemy hit multiple times.

swiftQuiver.name: Swift Quiver
swiftQuiver.description: For a short duration, your bow attacks cost significantly less stamina and have reduced cooldowns.

effects.name: Swift Quiver
effects.description: Bow skills cost less stamina and have shorter cooldowns.

hailOfArrows.name: Hail of Arrows
hailOfArrows.description: Fire a dense hail of arrows into the sky, which then rains down on enemies in a target area, dealing damage and potentially slowing them.

effects.name: Pinned
effects.description: Movement speed reduced.

nimbleShot.name: Nimble Shot
nimbleShot.description: Fire a quick shot while repositioning, granting a temporary dodge bonus.

windWalk.name: Wind Walk
windWalk.description: Become like the wind, moving with incredible speed. Greatly increases movement speed and allows your next bow attack to ignore some armor.

effects.name: Wind Walker
effects.description: Speed increased. Next Bow attack ignores 25% armor.

galeForceShot.name: Gale Force Shot
galeForceShot.description: Channel the power of a gale into your arrow, firing a shot that deals high damage and knocks the target back significantly.

endlessVolley.name: Endless Volley
endlessVolley.description: Channel your focus to unleash a continuous volley of arrows at a target area as long as you have stamina. Each arrow deals moderate damage.

barbedArrow.name: Barbed Arrow
barbedArrow.description: Fire an arrow with vicious barbs that lodges in the target, causing a painful bleed.

serratedShot.name: Serrated Shot
serratedShot.description: Launch an arrow designed to tear flesh. Deals moderate initial damage and applies a bleed that deals more damage the lower the target's health.

bleedingVolley.name: Bleeding Volley
bleedingVolley.description: Fire a volley of barbed arrows at an area, causing all enemies hit to bleed.

hemorrhagingArrow.name: Hemorrhaging Arrow
hemorrhagingArrow.description: A shot aimed to cause profuse bleeding. Inflicts a powerful bleed effect that also reduces the target's maximum health temporarily.

effects.name: Weakened Blood
effects.description: Max Health reduced by 10%.

fleshRend.name: Flesh Rend
fleshRend.description: If the target is already bleeding, this arrow tears the wound open further, dealing immediate bonus damage and extending the duration of all active bleeds on them.

persistentWound.name: Persistent Wound
persistentWound.description: For a duration, your arrows are enchanted to cause wounds that are harder to heal, reducing healing received by targets you hit and making your bleeds last longer.

effects.name: Persistent Wounds
effects.description: Arrow hits reduce healing and extend bleeds.

gushingArrow.name: Gushing Arrow
gushingArrow.description: A powerful shot that causes a severe, gushing wound. This bleed deals high damage quickly but doesn't last as long.

thornTrapArrow.name: Thorn Trap Arrow
thornTrapArrow.description: Fire an arrow that deploys a patch of thorny vines on impact, damaging, slowing, and bleeding enemies who enter or are caught in the area.

venomousShot.name: Venomous Shot
venomousShot.description: Fire an arrow steeped in potent viper venom, dealing initial damage and inflicting a debilitating poison that also saps their strength and slows them.

effects.name: Envenomed
effects.description: Strength and Speed reduced by the venom.

toxicCloudArrow.name: Toxic Cloud Arrow
toxicCloudArrow.description: Fire an arrow that shatters on impact, releasing a cloud of toxic gas. Deals minor initial damage and creates a zone that poisons enemies and reduces their accuracy.

paralyticTip.name: Paralytic Tip
paralyticTip.description: Carefully apply a fast-acting paralytic agent to your next arrow. That arrow has a high chance to stun the target on hit.

effects.name: Paralytic Arrow
effects.description: Next Bow attack has +60% Stun chance.

debilitatingVenom.name: Debilitating Venom
debilitatingVenom.description: An arrow coated in a venom that saps vitality, dealing damage and applying a poison that significantly reduces all resistances of the target.

applyConcentratedPoison.name: Apply Concentrated Poison
applyConcentratedPoison.description: Spend time to apply an extremely potent poison to your bow. Your next few arrow attacks will inflict a devastating, long-lasting poison.

effects.name: Concentrated Poison
effects.description: Next 2 Bow attacks apply Virulent Toxin.

corrosiveArrow.name: Corrosive Arrow
corrosiveArrow.description: Fire an arrow tipped with a highly corrosive substance, dealing Chemical damage and severely reducing the target's armor.

effects.name: Corroded
effects.description: Armor significantly reduced.

poisonGasTrap.name: Poison Gas Trap Arrow
poisonGasTrap.description: Fire an arrow that deploys a hidden trap. When triggered, it releases a large cloud of debilitating poison gas that damages, poisons, and reduces combat effectiveness of enemies.

poisonedArrow.name: Venomous Shot
poisonedArrow.description: Fire an arrow steeped in potent viper venom, dealing initial damage and inflicting a debilitating poison that also saps their strength and slows them.

effects.name: Viper Venom
effects.description: A potent toxin that wracks the body with pain, dealing damage and reducing physical capabilities.

effects.name: Envenomed
effects.description: Strength and Speed reduced by the venom.

evasiveShot.name: Evasive Shot
evasiveShot.description: Fire a nimble shot while repositioning, dealing moderate damage and granting you a temporary, significant increase to your dodge chance.

mistForm.name: Mist Form
mistForm.description: Temporarily dissolve into a mist-like form, becoming highly evasive and reducing all damage taken.

effects.name: Mist Form
effects.description: Dodge chance and Damage Reduction greatly increased.

phantomArrow.name: Phantom Arrow
phantomArrow.description: Fire an ethereal arrow that phases through some defenses, dealing Shadow damage and ignoring a portion of the target's armor.

disorientingShot.name: Disorienting Shot
disorientingShot.description: A trick shot that deals minor damage but disorients the target, significantly reducing their accuracy.

effects.name: Disoriented
effects.description: Accuracy greatly reduced.

shadowmeldShot.name: Shadowmeld Shot
shadowmeldShot.description: Requires Stealth. Fire a powerful, silent arrow from the shadows. This attack has a high chance to not break your stealth.

untouchableStance.name: Untouchable Stance
untouchableStance.description: Adopt a purely defensive stance, making you almost impossible to hit for a few moments. You cannot attack while in this stance.

effects.name: Untouchable
effects.description: Dodge is massively increased, but you cannot attack.

ricochetEvasion.name: Ricochet Evasion
ricochetEvasion.description: Fire a specially crafted arrow that ricochets between up to three enemies. With each bounce, you gain a stacking dodge bonus.

effects.name: Ricochet Dodge
effects.description: Dodge increased.

blinkArrow.name: Blink Arrow
blinkArrow.description: Fire a mystical arrow to a target location and instantly teleport there, leaving behind a disorienting flash of light that damages and dazes enemies at your origin point.

dualCriticalStrike.name: Dual Critical Strike
dualCriticalStrike.description: Strike twice with your weapons, each blow precisely aimed at a vital point to maximize critical hit potential.

precisionFlurry.name: Precision Flurry
precisionFlurry.description: Unleash a flurry of four precise strikes. Each critical hit in the flurry increases the critical chance of the subsequent hits.

vitalPointAssault.name: Vital Point Assault
vitalPointAssault.description: A single, powerful thrust targeting a foe's exposed weakness. This attack deals significantly more damage and has a higher critical chance against debuffed enemies.

bladeStormCrit.name: Blade Storm
bladeStormCrit.description: Become a maelstrom of blades, striking all nearby enemies. Each hit has an increased critical strike chance, and critical hits cause the target to bleed.

exploitOpening.name: Exploit Opening
exploitOpening.description: After an enemy misses or you parry their attack, you can instantly retaliate with a swift counter-attack that is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

dancingDeath.name: Dancing Death
dancingDeath.description: Enter a deadly combat dance, increasing your attack speed and critical strike chance. For the duration, your critical strikes also deal bonus Shadow damage.

effects.name: Dancing Death
effects.description: Attack Speed & Crit Chance up. Crits deal bonus Shadow damage.

ruthlessEfficiency.name: Ruthless Efficiency
ruthlessEfficiency.description: Activate a state of ruthless focus. For a short duration, your critical strikes refund a portion of their stamina cost and have a chance to reduce cooldowns.

effects.name: Ruthless Efficiency
effects.description: Crits refund stamina and may reduce cooldowns.

twinSerpentStrike.name: Twin Serpent Strike
twinSerpentStrike.description: Two viper-fast strikes. Each hit applies a stacking debuff that increases damage taken from critical hits.

whirlwindAttack.name: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwindAttack.description: Spin rapidly, striking all adjacent enemies with your dual weapons. Your movement speed is increased briefly after the attack.

rapidAssault.name: Rapid Assault
rapidAssault.description: Unleash a blindingly fast three-hit combo on a single target. Very short cooldown.

bladeDanceSpeed.name: Blade Dance (Speed)
bladeDanceSpeed.description: Enter a frenetic dance, massively increasing your attack speed and granting a chance for your melee attacks to strike an additional time.

effects.name: Blade Dance
effects.description: Attack speed greatly increased. Attacks have a chance to hit again.

cycloneOfSteel.name: Cyclone of Steel
cycloneOfSteel.description: Become a continuous vortex of steel, damaging all nearby enemies each second you channel the ability.

swiftRetaliation.name: Swift Retaliation
swiftRetaliation.description: After dodging an attack, your next melee skill costs no stamina and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

effects.name: Swift Retaliation
effects.description: Next melee skill is free and has reduced cooldown.

unstoppableFlurry.name: Unstoppable Flurry
unstoppableFlurry.description: For a short duration, you become immune to crowd control effects and your movement speed cannot be reduced. Each attack you make slightly reduces the duration of this effect.

effects.name: Unstoppable
effects.description: Immune to CC. Duration reduces on attack.

mirrorImageStrikes.name: Mirror Image Strikes
mirrorImageStrikes.description: Summon a fleeting, mirrored image of yourself. For a few seconds, it mimics your melee attacks on the same target for a fraction of the damage.

shadowCloneAssault.name: Shadow Clone Assault
shadowCloneAssault.description: Create two shadow clones that rush towards different enemies, each delivering a powerful strike before dissipating.

twinBleedStrike.name: Twin Bleed Strike
twinBleedStrike.description: Two quick slashes that are designed to open deep wounds, each with a high chance to cause bleeding.

gushingWounds.name: Gushing Wounds
gushingWounds.description: A brutal stab that exploits existing bleeds. Instantly deals a burst of damage for each bleed effect on the target.

danceOfThorns.name: Dance of Thorns
danceOfThorns.description: Spin in a deadly dance, lashing out at all nearby enemies. All enemies hit are afflicted with a stacking bleed.

hemorrhagingFlurry.name: Hemorrhaging Flurry
hemorrhagingFlurry.description: A rapid series of four strikes against a single target. Each hit has an increasing chance to apply a bleed.

deepCut.name: Deep Cut
deepCut.description: A powerful, focused slash that inflicts a grievous wound, causing a long-lasting and severe bleed.

bloodiedBlades.name: Bloodied Blades
bloodiedBlades.description: For a short duration, your blades are magically enhanced. A portion of all damage you deal to bleeding targets is returned to you as health.

effects.name: Bloodied Blades
effects.description: Gain Lifesteal against bleeding targets.

fleshCarver.name: Flesh Carver
fleshCarver.description: A brutal strike that deals bonus damage for each bleed effect on the target and combines them into a single, more potent bleed.

painfulTwist.name: Painful Twist
painfulTwist.description: Twist a blade in an existing wound, dealing minor damage and applying a debuff that causes the target to take a burst of damage whenever they use a stamina-costing skill.

effects.name: Painful Wound
effects.description: Take damage when using Stamina skills.

dualPoisonStrike.name: Dual Poison Strike
dualPoisonStrike.description: Two rapid strikes with poisoned blades, each applying a stack of deadly venom.

venomousFlurry.name: Venomous Flurry
venomousFlurry.description: Unleash a flurry of four envenomed strikes. Each hit has an increasing chance to apply poison.

plagueWind.name: Plague Wind
plagueWind.description: Spin, creating a whirlwind of toxic air that damages and poisons all nearby enemies, also reducing their healing received.

effects.name: Plagued
effects.description: Healing received -30%.

noxiousGasBomb.name: Noxious Gas Bomb
noxiousGasBomb.description: Hurl a bomb that explodes into a lingering cloud of noxious gas, dealing damage over time and reducing the armor of enemies within.

systemicShock.name: Systemic Shock
systemicShock.description: A strike with a special toxin that overwhelms the target's system. Instantly deals a burst of damage for each poison effect on the target.

coatBladesPoison.name: Coat Blades (Poison)
coatBladesPoison.description: Carefully apply a masterfully crafted poison to your weapons. For a duration, your melee attacks have a high chance to apply a virulent, stacking poison.

effects.name: Virulent Coating
effects.description: Melee attacks have a high chance to apply Virulent Poison.

festeringWound.name: Festering Wound
festeringWound.description: Stab the target with a blade coated in flesh-eating bacteria. Inflicts a poison that increases in damage each turn it remains on the target.

paralyticAgent.name: Paralytic Agent
paralyticAgent.description: Strike with a blade tipped with a powerful neurotoxin. Deals minor damage but has a high chance to stun the target.

evasiveDualStrike.name: Evasive Dual Strike
evasiveDualStrike.description: Two swift strikes performed as part of an evasive maneuver, increasing your dodge chance for a short duration.

shadowDance.name: Shadow Dance
shadowDance.description: Enter a Shadow Dance, allowing you to use your Stealth-requiring abilities without being in stealth for a short duration. Also increases dodge.

effects.name: Shadow Dance
effects.description: Can use Stealth abilities. Dodge increased.

bladeWeaveDefense.name: Blade Weave Defense
bladeWeaveDefense.description: Weave your blades in a defensive pattern, greatly increasing your chance to parry incoming melee and ranged attacks for a short time.

effects.name: Blade Weave
effects.description: Parry chance greatly increased.

riposteMastery.name: Riposte Mastery
riposteMastery.description: After successfully parrying, unleash a flawless, lightning-fast counter-attack that deals bonus damage and reduces the target's accuracy.

effects.name: Unbalanced
effects.description: Accuracy reduced.

phantomFootwork.name: Phantom Footwork
phantomFootwork.description: Your footwork becomes impossibly fluid and hard to predict. For a duration, you gain a high chance to dodge, and each dodge grants you a burst of speed.

effects.name: Phantom Footwork
effects.description: High dodge chance. Dodges grant speed.

unseenBlade.name: Unseen Blade
unseenBlade.description: Requires Stealth. Attack with a blade shrouded in shadow, dealing high Shadow damage and guaranteeing your next incoming attack will be a miss.

effects.name: Unseen
effects.description: Next attack will be dodged.

flowState.name: Flow State
flowState.description: Enter a state of perfect combat flow. For a short time, dodging or parrying an attack resets the cooldown of one of your evasive or counter-attack skills.

effects.name: Flow State
effects.description: Dodging/Parrying resets an Evasion/Riposte skill cooldown.

mirrorDodge.name: Mirror Dodge
mirrorDodge.description: Create a phantasmal duplicate at your location and leap to a new spot. The duplicate will absorb the next attack directed at your original position before vanishing.

berserkStrike.name: Berserk Strike
berserkStrike.description: A savage strike fueled by rage. Deals bonus damage based on your missing health.

frenziedAssault.name: Frenzied Assault
frenziedAssault.description: Unleash a flurry of wild attacks, hitting a random enemy up to 4 times. Attack speed increases with each hit.

recklessCharge.name: Reckless Charge
recklessCharge.description: Charge an enemy with no regard for your own safety, dealing damage and stunning them. You take 10% of the damage dealt as recoil.

bloodthirstyCleave.name: Bloodthirsty Cleave
bloodthirstyCleave.description: A wide, savage cleave that hits up to 3 front-row enemies. If this attack kills an enemy, you are healed for a small amount.

savageRoar.name: Savage Roar
savageRoar.description: Let out a terrifying roar that fears nearby enemies and grants you a surge of attack power.

unendingRage.name: Unending Rage
unendingRage.description: For a duration, your stamina costs are halved and you become immune to Fear effects. Your rage grows with every hit you take, increasing your damage.

effects.name: Unending Rage
effects.description: Stamina costs halved, immune to Fear. Damage increases when hit.

painFuel.name: Pain Fuel
painFuel.description: Embrace the pain. For a short time, a percentage of damage you take is converted into stamina.

effects.name: Pain Fuel
effects.description: Convert 20% of damage taken to Stamina.

deathWish.name: Death Wish
deathWish.description: Enter a state of suicidal fury, massively increasing your damage dealt but also increasing all damage you take.

effects.name: Death Wish
effects.description: Damage dealt +50%, Damage taken +25%.

ironSkin.name: Iron Skin
ironSkin.description: Harden your skin to the consistency of iron, massively increasing your armor and granting resistance to physical damage for a short time.

effects.name: Iron Skin
effects.description: Armor and Physical Resistance greatly increased.

stalwartDefense.name: Stalwart Defense
stalwartDefense.description: Assume a defensive stance that increases your block chance and regenerates a small amount of health each turn.

effects.name: Stalwart
effects.description: Block chance increased. Regenerating health.

enduringStrike.name: Enduring Strike
