enduringStrike.description: A powerful strike that also bolsters your resolve, granting you a temporary shield that absorbs damage.

perfectBlock.name: Perfect Block
perfectBlock.description: Focus your defenses, guaranteeing your next block. A perfect block will completely negate the damage of the attack.

effects.name: Perfect Block
effects.description: Next block negates all damage.

resilientStand.name: Resilient Stand
resilientStand.description: Brace for impact. For a short duration, you take significantly reduced damage from all sources, but your movement is heavily impeded.

effects.name: Resilient Stand
effects.description: Damage reduction +40%, Speed -75%.

defensiveRiposte.name: Defensive Riposte
defensiveRiposte.description: After blocking an attack, perform a swift counter that deals moderate damage and temporarily increases your armor.

unbreakableWill.name: Unbreakable Will
unbreakableWill.description: Channel your immense willpower, instantly cleansing all negative debuffs from yourself and becoming highly resistant to new ones for a short time.

effects.name: Unbreakable Will
effects.description: Debuff resistance +75%.

lastStand.name: Last Stand
lastStand.description: When critically injured, you can make a last stand, temporarily increasing your maximum health by 50% for a short duration.

execute.name: Execute
execute.description: A brutal finishing blow that deals massive bonus damage to targets below 25% health.

mortalStrike.name: Mortal Strike
mortalStrike.description: A grievous wound that deals significant damage and reduces all healing the target receives for a duration.

effects.name: Mortal Wound
effects.description: Healing received -50%.

precisionKill.name: Precision Kill
precisionKill.description: A carefully aimed thrust that has a massively increased critical hit chance against a single target.

decapitate.name: Decapitate
decapitate.description: Attempt to instantly kill a non-boss enemy below a certain health threshold. If the target is not killed, it deals massive damage instead.

focusedBlow.name: Focused Blow
focusedBlow.description: Focus all your energy, guaranteeing your next single-target melee attack will be a critical hit and ignore a portion of armor.

effects.name: Focused Blow
effects.description: Next single-target melee attack is a crit and ignores 25% armor.

markForDeath.name: Mark for Death
markForDeath.description: Mark an enemy for execution. For a duration, they take increased damage from all sources, and if they die while marked, your cooldowns are refreshed.

effects.name: Marked for Death
effects.description: Takes 20% increased damage.

overpower.name: Overpower
overpower.description: A powerful blow that cannot be dodged or parried, forcing an opening.

fatalStrike.name: Fatal Strike
fatalStrike.description: A single, incredibly deadly strike. Has a high chance to critically hit and deals immense critical damage, but leaves you exposed, reducing your armor briefly.

crushingBlow.name: Crushing Blow
crushingBlow.description: A mighty blow that deals high damage and has a chance to daze the opponent, reducing their damage output.

shatteringStrike.name: Shattering Strike
shatteringStrike.description: A powerful strike that shatters armor, applying a significant armor reduction debuff to the target.

powerAttack.name: Power Attack
powerAttack.description: Gather your strength for one immense blow. High damage, but lower accuracy.

unstoppableForce.name: Unstoppable Force
unstoppableForce.description: Become an unstoppable force for a short duration, gaining immunity to slows and knockbacks, and your attacks have a chance to knock enemies down.

effects.name: Unstoppable
effects.description: Immune to slows/knockbacks. Attacks may knockdown.

staggeringImpact.name: Staggering Impact
staggeringImpact.description: Deliver a heavy, staggering blow that deals high damage and has a high chance to stun the target.

heavySwing.name: Heavy Swing
heavySwing.description: A slow but powerful swing that hits the primary target and cleaves to one adjacent enemy for reduced damage.

momentumStrike.name: Momentum Strike
momentumStrike.description: A solid strike that builds momentum. Each consecutive use of this skill on the same target within a short window deals increased damage, stacking up to 3 times.

bullRush.name: Bull Rush
bullRush.description: Charge forward, bowling over the first enemy you hit and any behind them in a line. Deals damage and knocks back all affected enemies.

rapidSlash.name: Rapid Slash
rapidSlash.description: A lightning-fast slash with your weapon. Low cost and cooldown, perfect for sustained offense.

dancingBlade.name: Dancing Blade
dancingBlade.description: Perform a dizzying dance of blades, striking a random enemy up to 5 times. Each hit grants a small, stacking speed boost.

swiftCounter.name: Swift Counter
swiftCounter.description: After dodging an attack, your next attack is instant (no action cost) and deals bonus damage.

effects.name: Swift Counter
effects.description: Next attack is free and empowered.

blurringMovement.name: Blurring Movement
blurringMovement.description: Move in a blur, greatly increasing your dodge chance and making your next melee attack un-parryable.

effects.name: Blurred
effects.description: Dodge increased. Next melee attack cannot be parried.

hasteSelf.name: Haste
hasteSelf.description: Temporarily imbue yourself with supernatural speed, massively increasing your attack speed.

effects.name: Hasted
effects.description: Attack Speed +50%.

flowingStrikes.name: Flowing Strikes
flowingStrikes.description: A graceful combo of strikes that flows from one enemy to another, hitting up to 3 different targets.

windWalkWarrior.name: Wind Walk
windWalkWarrior.description: Move like the wind, gaining increased movement speed and causing your next attack to deal bonus Air damage.

effects.name: Wind Walker
effects.description: Speed increased. Next attack deals bonus Air damage.

tempoMastery.name: Tempo Mastery
tempoMastery.description: A strike that sets the tempo of the fight. If you use this skill again within 3 seconds, it costs less stamina and has a shorter cooldown.

effects.name: Tempo
effects.description: Tempo Mastery is cheaper and faster to use.

rallyingCry.name: Rallying Cry
rallyingCry.description: Let out a powerful cry that bolsters all allies, granting them increased damage and a small amount of temporary health.

commandersStrike.name: Commander's Strike
commandersStrike.description: A decisive strike that inspires a nearby ally, allowing them to immediately perform a basic attack.

tacticalAdvance.name: Tactical Advance
tacticalAdvance.description: Order an advance, increasing the movement speed of all allies and allowing them to ignore difficult terrain for a short duration.

inspireCourage.name: Inspire Courage
inspireCourage.description: Inspire courage in an ally, removing Fear effects and making them immune to Fear for a duration.

battleStandard.name: Battle Standard
battleStandard.description: Plant a battle standard that creates an inspirational aura. Allies within the aura gain increased critical hit chance and stamina regeneration.

coordinatedOffense.name: Coordinated Offense
coordinatedOffense.description: Direct your allies to focus fire on a single target, increasing the damage that target takes from all allies for a short period.

holdFormation.name: Hold Formation
holdFormation.description: Order allies to hold their formation, granting all nearby allies increased armor and resistance to knockback.

disruptEnemyLines.name: Disrupt Enemy Lines
disruptEnemyLines.description: Charge into the enemy formation, dealing damage and applying a debuff that reduces the armor of all enemies in a line.

impenetrableWall.name: Impenetrable Wall
impenetrableWall.description: For a short duration, you become an impenetrable wall, blocking all incoming frontal attacks.

shieldFortress.name: Shield Fortress
shieldFortress.description: Create a bastion of defense. You and adjacent allies gain a massive armor and block chance bonus, but cannot move.

aegisOfProtection.name: Aegis of Protection
aegisOfProtection.description: Place a powerful protective ward on an ally that absorbs a large amount of damage.

guardianStance.name: Guardian Stance
guardianStance.description: Enter a guardian stance. Your block chance is increased, and each successful block slightly heals you.

repelAssault.name: Repel Assault
repelAssault.description: Bash your shield, creating a shockwave that knocks back all nearby enemies and deals minor damage.

unwaveringDefense.name: Unwavering Defense
unwaveringDefense.description: Your defense is unwavering, making you immune to armor reduction debuffs for a duration.

coverAlly.name: Cover Ally
coverAlly.description: Step in to take the next hit intended for an ally. You take reduced damage from this hit.

sentinelsResolve.name: Sentinel's Resolve
sentinelsResolve.description: Steel your resolve, gaining increased vitality and resistance to all magical damage for a period.

shieldedExecution.name: Shielded Execution
shieldedExecution.description: Perform a powerful execution strike on a low health target while maintaining a defensive posture, increasing your block chance during the attack.

targetedBash.name: Targeted Bash
targetedBash.description: A focused shield bash that interrupts spellcasting and has a high chance to stun.

phalanxSmash.name: Phalanx Smash
phalanxSmash.description: A devastating smash that breaks through enemy defenses, ignoring a large portion of the target's armor.

breakDefense.name: Break Defense
breakDefense.description: A calculated strike that breaks the enemy's guard, reducing their block and parry chance to zero for a short time.

guardedBlade.name: Guarded Blade
guardedBlade.description: Attack with your blade while keeping your shield raised. This attack has a lower critical chance but increases your armor during the action.

precisionShieldStrike.name: Precision Shield Strike
precisionShieldStrike.description: A precise shield strike that has a higher critical chance and deals bonus critical damage.

duelistsChallenge.name: Duelist's Challenge
duelistsChallenge.description: Challenge a single powerful enemy to a duel. You deal increased damage to them, and they deal reduced damage to anyone but you.

effects.name: Duelist's Focus
effects.description: Deal +25% damage to the challenged target.

effects.name: Challenged
effects.description: Deals -25% damage to targets other than the challenger.

armorPiercingBash.name: Armor Piercing Bash
armorPiercingBash.description: A shield bash so powerful it dents and pierces armor, ignoring a portion of it and applying a stacking armor reduction debuff.

shieldSweep.name: Shield Sweep
shieldSweep.description: Sweep your shield in a wide arc, hitting all enemies in front of you and with a chance to knock them down.

sweepingBlade.name: Sweeping Blade
sweepingBlade.description: A wide arcing slash that follows up a shield bash, hitting multiple enemies.

cleavingBash.name: Cleaving Bash
cleavingBash.description: A powerful shield bash that can hit up to two adjacent enemies, stunning them both.

stormOfSteel.name: Storm of Steel
stormOfSteel.description: Unleash a flurry of attacks in a whirlwind, hitting all nearby enemies multiple times while maintaining a high block chance.

whirlwindDefense.name: Whirlwind Defense
whirlwindDefense.description: Spin with your shield outstretched, deflecting projectiles and knocking back any enemies that get too close.

holdTheBreach.name: Hold the Breach
holdTheBreach.description: You become a focal point of defense. For a duration, any damage dealt to allies behind you is reduced, and attackers have a chance to be taunted.

repellingWave.name: Repelling Wave
repellingWave.description: Slam your shield into the ground, creating a wave of force that damages and knocks back all enemies in a cone.

shockwaveSlam.name: Shockwave Slam
shockwaveSlam.description: A powerful ground slam with your shield that sends out a shockwave, damaging and stunning all nearby enemies.

empoweredShieldBash.name: Empowered Shield Bash
empoweredShieldBash.description: Channel your strength into your shield, delivering a devastating bash that deals high damage and ignores a portion of armor.

commandingStrikeShielded.name: Commanding Strike (Shielded)
commandingStrikeShielded.description: A powerful, commanding strike that also rallies a nearby ally, granting them bonus damage on their next attack.

guardiansMight.name: Guardian's Might
guardiansMight.description: Tap into your inner strength, granting yourself and a chosen ally a significant bonus to Strength and Armor.

shieldedPowerAttack.name: Shielded Power Attack
shieldedPowerAttack.description: Brace with your shield and deliver an immensely powerful attack with your weapon. You have increased block chance during this attack.

resoluteCharge.name: Resolute Charge
resoluteCharge.description: Charge with your shield leading, becoming unstoppable during the charge. You deal damage and knock back the target.

unbreakableFormation.name: Unbreakable Formation
unbreakableFormation.description: Inspire allies to form an unbreakable line. For a duration, all nearby allies gain damage reduction and reflect a portion of damage taken.

divineRetributionShield.name: Divine Retribution (Shield)
divineRetributionShield.description: Your shield glows with holy power. For a short time, every successful block unleashes a burst of holy light, damaging nearby enemies.

forcefulReposte.name: Forceful Reposte
forcefulReposte.description: After blocking, unleash a powerful counter-attack that has a chance to knock the attacker down.

shieldDashAttack.name: Shield Dash Attack
shieldDashAttack.description: A rapid dash followed by a shield slam. Grants a temporary speed boost after use.

swiftGuard.name: Swift Guard
swiftGuard.description: Quickly raise your shield, granting a brief but significant boost to your block and dodge chance.

bladeAndShieldFlow.name: Blade and Shield Flow
bladeAndShieldFlow.description: Perform a seamless combo of a weapon strike and a shield bash. The weapon strike increases your attack speed, the shield bash reduces the target's.

rapidBlock.name: Rapid Block
rapidBlock.description: Enter a stance where for a few seconds, you can block multiple attacks in rapid succession.

agileCounter.name: Agile Counter
agileCounter.description: After a successful block, perform an exceptionally fast counter-attack that's hard to avoid.

windWallShield.name: Wind Wall Shield
windWallShield.description: Create a wall of wind with your shield that deflects all incoming projectiles for a short time.

protectorsFlurry.name: Protector's Flurry
protectorsFlurry.description: Unleash a flurry of quick attacks against a single enemy. During the flurry, your dodge chance is increased.

nimbleDefense.name: Nimble Defense
nimbleDefense.description: Assume a nimble defensive posture, converting a portion of your block chance into dodge chance.

marshalsRally.name: Marshal's Rally
marshalsRally.description: A powerful rally that removes fear from all allies and grants them a potent buff to both damage and armor.

shieldedCommand.name: Shielded Command
shieldedCommand.description: Command an ally to strike, increasing their damage for the attack. You gain increased block chance while issuing the command.

inspiringDefense.name: Inspiring Defense
inspiringDefense.description: Your steadfast defense inspires allies. Grant a target ally a shield that absorbs damage and increases their damage resistance.

tacticalShieldWall.name: Tactical Shield Wall
tacticalShieldWall.description: You and adjacent allies form a shield wall, gaining a large block chance bonus. Allies in the wall also gain a small damage bonus.

battlefieldOrders.name: Battlefield Orders
battlefieldOrders.description: Issue orders to an ally, granting them a choice between a temporary massive damage boost or a massive defensive boost.

bannerOfCourage.name: Banner of Courage
bannerOfCourage.description: Plant a banner of courage that makes all allies within its aura immune to fear and grants them increased critical hit resistance.

coordinatedGuard.name: Coordinated Guard
coordinatedGuard.description: You and a target ally enter a guarded stance. While linked, a portion of damage taken by either of you is shared between you.

heroicStand.name: Heroic Stand
heroicStand.description: Make a heroic stand, taunting all enemies and becoming nearly invincible for a short duration, taking massively reduced damage.

berserkSweep.name: Berserk Sweep
berserkSweep.description: A wide, furious sweep with your greatweapon, hitting all front-row enemies. Damage is increased the lower your health is.

colossalSmash.name: Colossal Smash
colossalSmash.description: A single, devastating overhead smash. High damage, high critical chance, but reduces your armor for a short time after.

unleashRage.name: Unleash Rage
unleashRage.description: Unleash your inner rage, gaining a massive boost to Strength and Attack Speed, but becoming unable to distinguish friend from foe, possibly attacking allies.

behemothCharge.name: Behemoth Charge
behemothCharge.description: Charge forward like a behemoth, hitting all enemies in your path, knocking them aside and stunning them.

furiousCleave.name: Furious Cleave
furiousCleave.description: A furious cleave that deals more damage for each enemy hit.

primalScream.name: Primal Scream
primalScream.description: A primal scream that fears all nearby enemies and provides you with a short burst of lifesteal.

ignorePain.name: Ignore Pain
ignorePain.description: Through sheer rage, you ignore a large portion of incoming damage for a few seconds. The damage reduction is greater the lower your health.

unyieldingStance.name: Unyielding Stance
unyieldingStance.description: Plant your feet, becoming an immovable object. You gain immense armor and resistance to control effects, but cannot move.

colossalDefense.name: Colossal Defense
colossalDefense.description: Temporarily gain a massive amount of health and damage reduction.

earthWard.name: Earth Ward
earthWard.description: Call upon the earth to protect you, granting significant resistance to physical and earth damage.

titanGrip.name: Titan Grip
titanGrip.description: A powerful strike that also roots the enemy in place, preventing movement.

guardianSweep.name: Guardian Sweep
guardianSweep.description: A defensive sweep that damages enemies in front of you and increases your block chance for each enemy hit.

stoneForm.name: Stone Form
stoneForm.description: Temporarily turn your flesh to stone. You are immune to critical hits and regenerate health, but your speed is greatly reduced.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: Your resolve becomes unshakable, granting you immunity to taunts and fear for a duration.

fortifyPosition.name: Fortify Position
fortifyPosition.description: Fortify your current position, creating an aura that increases the armor of yourself and any adjacent allies.

giantSlayerStrike.name: Giant Slayer Strike
giantSlayerStrike.description: A powerful strike designed to fell larger foes, dealing bonus damage based on the target's maximum health.

executionersBlow.name: Executioner's Blow
executionersBlow.description: A refined executioner's chop. Deals massive damage to low-health targets, and if it kills the target, you regain a large amount of stamina.

sunderingStrike.name: Sundering Strike
sunderingStrike.description: A strike so powerful it sunders defenses, permanently reducing the target's armor.

focusedImpact.name: Focused Impact
focusedImpact.description: Channel all your might into a single, focused point of impact. High damage and ignores a significant portion of armor, but has a chance to miss.

mightyChop.name: Mighty Chop
mightyChop.description: A straightforward, immensely powerful chop that has an increased chance to be a critical hit.

cripplingBlow.name: Crippling Blow
cripplingBlow.description: A heavy blow aimed to cripple, dealing damage and reducing the target's Strength and Dexterity.

armorBreaker.name: Armor Breaker
armorBreaker.description: A specific technique to break armor, dealing significant damage and applying a stacking armor reduction debuff.

headTaker.name: Head Taker
headTaker.description: Enter a focused state. For a short time, killing an enemy with a single-target melee attack grants you a massive, stacking damage bonus.

reapingScythe.name: Reaping Scythe
reapingScythe.description: A wide, reaping swing that hits all enemies in a cone. Enemies at low health take bonus damage.

deathWhirlwind.name: Death Whirlwind
deathWhirlwind.description: Become a whirlwind of death, hitting all nearby enemies multiple times. Killing an enemy with this ability extends its duration.

harvestOfSouls.name: Harvest of Souls
harvestOfSouls.description: A sweeping attack that hits all nearby enemies. For each enemy killed by this attack, you are healed and gain a temporary damage boost.

cleaveTheMasses.name: Cleave the Masses
cleaveTheMasses.description: A powerful cleave that hits up to 4 enemies. The more enemies you hit, the more damage it deals.

battlefieldDomination.name: Battlefield Domination
battlefieldDomination.description: Assert your dominance. For a duration, your cleaving attacks can hit additional targets and have a chance to stun.

unstoppableAdvance.name: Unstoppable Advance
unstoppableAdvance.description: Advance unstoppably, striking enemies in your path. You are immune to control effects during the advance.

shockwaveCleave.name: Shockwave Cleave
shockwaveCleave.description: Slam your weapon down, sending a shockwave forward in a cone. Deals both Slash and Blunt damage.

fearfulPresence.name: Fearful Presence
fearfulPresence.description: Your mere presence on the battlefield is terrifying. Activate to send lesser enemies fleeing in terror.

earthshatter.name: Earthshatter
earthshatter.description: Slam your weapon into the ground with such force that it shatters the earth, dealing damage in a line and leaving behind difficult, damaging terrain.

titanicSlam.name: Titanic Slam
titanicSlam.description: A colossal slam that deals immense damage to a single target and stuns all adjacent enemies.

groundSplitter.name: Ground Splitter
groundSplitter.description: Split the ground, creating a chasm that deals damage and roots enemies caught within it.

immovableObjectStance.name: Immovable Object Stance
immovableObjectStance.description: You become an immovable object. You are immune to all forms of displacement and gain massive armor, but cannot move.

mountainousMight.name: Mountainous Might
mountainousMight.description: Channel the might of the mountain, massively increasing your Strength and Vitality for a short period.

obliterate.name: Obliterate
obliterate.description: An attack of such immense force that it has a chance to instantly kill non-boss enemies. If it doesn't kill, it stuns for an extended duration.

concussiveWave.name: Concussive Wave
concussiveWave.description: Slam your weapon to create a concussive wave that damages and dazes all enemies in a cone.

strengthOfTheEarth.name: Strength of the Earth
strengthOfTheEarth.description: Draw strength from the earth, granting you a shield that absorbs damage. The shield's strength is based on your maximum health.

captainsRally.name: Captain's Rally
captainsRally.description: An inspiring rally that boosts the offensive capabilities of all allies, granting bonus Strength and Accuracy.

commandingPresenceBuff.name: Commanding Presence
commandingPresenceBuff.description: Passive: Your commanding presence intimidates nearby enemies, slightly reducing their damage output.

chargeIntoBattle.name: Charge Into Battle
chargeIntoBattle.description: Lead the charge, smashing into an enemy and inspiring nearby allies with increased speed.

inspiringShout.name: Inspiring Shout
inspiringShout.description: A powerful shout that removes fear from allies in a wide area and grants them temporary health.

warBanner.name: War Banner
warBanner.description: Plant a war banner that greatly increases the Strength and Vitality of allies within its aura.

tacticalCleave.name: Tactical Cleave
tacticalCleave.description: A calculated cleave that hits multiple foes. If it hits 3 or more, you and nearby allies gain an accuracy bonus.

holdTheFront.name: Hold the Front
holdTheFront.description: Command the front line to hold. You and all allies in the front row gain a large defensive bonus.

demoralizingBlow.name: Demoralizing Blow
demoralizingBlow.description: A powerful blow that demoralizes the target and nearby enemies, reducing their damage and armor.

magmaWave.name: Magma Wave
magmaWave.description: Send a wave of molten rock forward, dealing Fire and Earth damage to all enemies in a line and leaving a trail of burning ground.

obsidianShardVolley.name: Obsidian Shard Volley
obsidianShardVolley.description: Launch a volley of superheated obsidian shards, hitting multiple enemies. Shards have a chance to cause bleeding.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Cause a target location to violently erupt, dealing massive AoE fire damage and knocking enemies into the air.

geothermalVent.name: Geothermal Vent
geothermalVent.description: Open a geothermal vent on the ground that releases a constant stream of scalding steam, damaging enemies and healing allies within it.

obsidianSpear.name: Obsidian Spear
obsidianSpear.description: Conjure and hurl a spear of sharpened obsidian. High damage and reduces target's armor.

magmaBlast.name: Magma Blast
magmaBlast.description: Unleash a blast of magma that explodes, dealing fire damage and leaving a pool of lava that damages enemies over time.

stoneAndFlameWard.name: Stone and Flame Ward
stoneAndFlameWard.description: Ward an ally, granting them increased armor and fire resistance. Melee attackers take fire damage.

eruptingEarth.name: Erupting Earth
eruptingEarth.description: Cause the earth to erupt in a target area, dealing Earth damage and spewing fiery projectiles that deal additional fire damage to enemies in the area.

moltenArmor.name: Molten Armor
moltenArmor.description: Encase yourself in molten armor. Provides high armor and fire resistance, but slightly reduces your speed.

fireStoneBarrage.name: Fire Stone Barrage
fireStoneBarrage.description: Launch a barrage of flaming stones at an area, dealing both Earth and Fire damage to all enemies within.

volcanicPillar.name: Volcanic Pillar
volcanicPillar.description: Summon a pillar of volcanic rock that erupts, dealing Fire damage and stunning the target.

infernoTrap.name: Inferno Trap
infernoTrap.description: Set a magical trap that, when triggered, erupts into a powerful inferno, dealing massive Fire damage and burning enemies in a large area.

flashFreeze.name: Flash Freeze
flashFreeze.description: Instantly freeze all nearby enemies, dealing Ice damage and rooting them in place for a short time.

infernoBlast.name: Inferno Blast
infernoBlast.description: Unleash a devastating blast of fire in a cone, dealing high damage and applying a potent burn.

thermalShock.name: Thermal Shock
thermalShock.description: Blast a burning enemy with intense cold, or a frozen enemy with intense heat. Deals bonus damage and shatters/extinguishes the effect.

frostfireBolt.name: Frostfire Bolt
frostfireBolt.description: Launch a bolt of frigid fire that deals both Ice and Fire damage, and slows the target.

iceComet.name: Ice Comet
iceComet.description: Call down a massive comet of ice, dealing heavy damage and freezing all enemies in a large area.

fireStorm.name: Fire Storm
fireStorm.description: Create a raging firestorm at a location, dealing continuous heavy Fire damage to all enemies within.

absoluteZeroAura.name: Absolute Zero Aura
absoluteZeroAura.description: Project an aura of absolute zero, continuously damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Enemies who stay in the aura for too long risk being frozen solid.

immolationAura.name: Immolation Aura
immolationAura.description: Wreathe yourself in flames, continuously damaging and burning nearby enemies. Your Fire resistance is greatly increased.

wildGrowthFire.name: Wild Growth (Fire)
wildGrowthFire.description: Cause explosive, fiery growth in an area. Damages enemies with thorns and fire, and leaves behind difficult terrain.

forestFire.name: Forest Fire
forestFire.description: Ignite a large area of the battlefield. The fire spreads over time, dealing heavy damage to any who stand within it.

entanglingAsh.name: Entangling Ash
entanglingAsh.description: Blast a target with hot ash and embers, dealing Fire damage and rooting them in place as the ash solidifies.

summonFireSprite.name: Summon Fire Sprite
summonFireSprite.description: Summon a mischievous fire sprite born from the heart of a wildfire. It attacks enemies with small fire bolts.

naturesWrathFire.name: Nature's Wrath (Fire)
naturesWrathFire.description: Call nature's wrath upon a foe, striking them with burning vines and thorns that deal both Nature and Fire damage.

healingFlames.name: Healing Flames
healingFlames.description: The life-giving aspect of fire. Cauterize an ally's wounds to heal them and apply a heal-over-time effect.

sunbeam.name: Sunbeam
sunbeam.description: Call down a concentrated beam of sunlight, dealing Fire and Holy damage to enemies in a line and silencing them.

thornLashFire.name: Thorn Lash (Fire)
thornLashFire.description: Lash out with a superheated, thorny vine that deals Nature damage and causes a burn.

immolatingDrain.name: Immolating Drain
immolatingDrain.description: Drain life from a target with a beam of fire, healing yourself for a portion of the damage dealt.

phoenixFire.name: Phoenix Fire
phoenixFire.description: Launch a fiery projectile that damages an enemy and then bounces to a nearby ally, healing them.

rebirthFlame.name: Rebirth Flame
rebirthFlame.description: When you would die, you can activate this skill to instead be reborn from the ashes, returning to 50% health and mana and damaging nearby enemies.

soulSiphonFire.name: Soul Siphon (Fire)
soulSiphonFire.description: Siphon the soul of a burning enemy, dealing damage and healing yourself for a large amount.

cauterizingBlast.name: Cauterizing Blast
cauterizingBlast.description: Unleash a blast of healing fire, damaging a nearby enemy and healing a nearby ally.

essenceTransferFire.name: Essence Transfer (Fire)
essenceTransferFire.description: Transfer your life essence to an ally, healing them at the cost of your own health. The transferred energy erupts, damaging enemies near the ally.

flameWardLeech.name: Flame Ward (Leech)
flameWardLeech.description: Ward an ally with a shield of life-draining flames. It absorbs damage, and when it expires or breaks, it heals the warded ally.

lifebindFlame.name: Lifebind Flame
lifebindFlame.description: Bind yourself to an ally with a flame of life. For a duration, a portion of the damage you deal heals them.

effects.name: Lifebind Flame
effects.description: Healed for 20% of the caster's damage dealt.

chargedStone.name: Charged Stone
chargedStone.description: Launch a stone charged with lightning, dealing Earth damage and arcing lightning to a nearby enemy for additional damage.

lightningRodEarth.name: Lightning Rod (Earth)
lightningRodEarth.description: Erect an earthen pillar that acts as a lightning rod. Periodically calls down lightning on a random nearby enemy.

staticFieldEarth.name: Static Field (Earth)
staticFieldEarth.description: Create a field of magnetized rock that slows enemies and deals damage to them if they cast spells within it.

magneticPulse.name: Magnetic Pulse
magneticPulse.description: Release a magnetic pulse from the earth, dealing lightning damage and pulling all nearby enemies towards you.

summonShockGolem.name: Summon Shock Golem
summonShockGolem.description: Summon a golem of magnetized rock that periodically zaps nearby enemies with lightning.

earthenConductor.name: Earthen Conductor
earthenConductor.description: Make an enemy an earthen conductor. They take increased damage from Lightning, and lightning that hits them may arc to others.

fulguriteSpear.name: Fulgurite Spear
fulguriteSpear.description: Hurl a spear of sand fused by lightning. Deals high lightning damage and reduces the target's lightning resistance.

tectonicDischarge.name: Tectonic Discharge
tectonicDischarge.description: Unleash the stored energy of the earth in a massive tectonic discharge, dealing Earth and Lightning damage to all enemies and stunning them.

geyserEruption.name: Geyser Eruption
geyserEruption.description: Summon a powerful geyser to erupt under a target, dealing high steam damage and launching them into the air.

steamCloudObscure.name: Obscuring Steam Cloud
steamCloudObscure.description: Create a dense cloud of steam. Enemies inside have their accuracy severely reduced, while allies inside gain dodge chance.

scaldingJet.name: Scalding Jet
scaldingJet.description: Blast an enemy with a jet of superheated water, dealing Steam damage and applying a burn.

boilingRain.name: Boiling Rain
boilingRain.description: Summon a downpour of boiling rain over an area, dealing continuous Steam damage to enemies.

mistVeil.name: Mist Veil
mistVeil.description: Shrouds an ally in a protective mist, making them harder to hit and granting them stealth for a short time.

hydrothermalBlast.name: Hydrothermal Blast
hydrothermalBlast.description: A focused blast of steam and water. Deals steam damage and leaves the target Drenched, increasing their vulnerability to cold and lightning.

pressureRelease.name: Pressure Release
pressureRelease.description: Instantly release built-up pressure, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them back.

vaporForm.name: Vapor Form
vaporForm.description: Turn into a cloud of vapor, becoming untargetable by single-target attacks and regenerating mana quickly.

spectralGale.name: Spectral Gale
spectralGale.description: Summon a gale of wailing spirits that damages enemies in a line and reduces their magical resistances.

raiseStormWraith.name: Raise Storm Wraith
raiseStormWraith.description: Raise a powerful Storm Wraith from a corpse. It attacks with lightning and is resistant to physical damage.

howlingDeath.name: Howling Death
howlingDeath.description: Unleash a howling vortex of deathly winds that damages all enemies and has a chance to fear them.

animateWindCorpse.name: Animate Wind Corpse
animateWindCorpse.description: Animate a corpse with swift winds, creating a fast but fragile undead servant.

necroticCyclone.name: Necrotic Cyclone
necroticCyclone.description: Conjure a cyclone of necrotic energy that damages, slows, and reduces healing on enemies caught within.

soulVortex.name: Soul Vortex
soulVortex.description: Create a vortex that pulls in enemy souls, dealing shadow damage over time and silencing them.

phantomWinds.name: Phantom Winds
phantomWinds.description: Empower an undead minion with phantom winds, increasing its speed and allowing its attacks to ignore some armor.

lichChillAura.name: Lich's Chill Aura
lichChillAura.description: Exude an aura of deathly cold. Enemies near you are slowed and take continuous Necrotic damage. Their resistance to Air damage is also reduced.

summonFireElemental.name: Summon Fire Elemental
summonFireElemental.description: Summon a powerful Fire Elemental to fight for you. It has strong fire attacks and a burning aura.

summonEarthElemental.name: Summon Earth Elemental
summonEarthElemental.description: Summon a durable Earth Elemental to fight for you. It is highly resilient and can taunt enemies.

summonWaterElemental.name: Summon Water Elemental
summonWaterElemental.description: Summon a versatile Water Elemental to fight for you. It can damage foes and provide minor healing to allies.

summonAirElemental.name: Summon Air Elemental
summonAirElemental.description: Summon a swift Air Elemental to fight for you. It attacks rapidly with gusts of wind and is hard to hit.

empowerElemental.name: Empower Elemental
empowerElemental.description: Greatly empower one of your summoned elementals, increasing its size, damage, and health, and unlocking a special ability.

elementalBlast.name: Elemental Blast
elementalBlast.description: Command your active elemental to unleash a powerful blast of its element in an area.

primalSurge.name: Primal Surge
primalSurge.description: Channel a surge of primal energy, healing all your summoned elementals and granting them increased attack speed.

elementalFusion.name: Elemental Fusion
elementalFusion.description: Requires two different active elementals. Fuse them into a powerful, temporary Primal Elemental with combined abilities.

arcaneBloodBolt.name: Arcane Blood Bolt
arcaneBloodBolt.description: Sacrifice a small amount of health to launch a bolt of volatile arcane energy, dealing Arcane damage and applying a curse that increases magic damage taken.

sanguineSurge.name: Sanguine Surge
sanguineSurge.description: Sacrifice health to cause a surge of arcane power, restoring a large amount of mana to yourself.

hemomanticArcana.name: Hemomantic Arcana
hemomanticArcana.description: Unleash a wave of blood-infused arcane energy that damages enemies and heals you for each enemy hit.

lifeTapArcane.name: Life Tap (Arcane)
lifeTapArcane.description: Sacrifice health to empower your next Arcane spell, increasing its damage and causing it to apply a potent bleed.

bloodShieldArcane.name: Blood Shield (Arcane)
bloodShieldArcane.description: Sacrifice a significant portion of health to create a powerful arcane shield on an ally that absorbs damage and explodes when broken, dealing Arcane damage.

forbiddenKnowledge.name: Forbidden Knowledge
forbiddenKnowledge.description: Tap into forbidden knowledge, sacrificing 20% of your current health to reset the cooldown of your other non-ultimate Arcane and Blood Magic spells.

essenceDrainArcane.name: Essence Drain (Arcane)
essenceDrainArcane.description: Channel a beam of arcane energy that drains both life and mana from the target, healing and restoring you.

crimsonRune.name: Crimson Rune
crimsonRune.description: Inscribe a crimson rune on the ground with your own blood. When triggered, it explodes, dealing Arcane damage and cursing enemies to take more damage from Blood Magic.

stoneWall.name: Stone Wall
stoneWall.description: Raise a solid wall of stone from the earth, blocking movement and line of sight.

petrify.name: Petrify
petrify.description: Attempt to turn a single enemy to stone, rendering them unable to act for a long duration. Petrified enemies are highly resistant to damage.

earthquakeMajor.name: Earthquake
earthquakeMajor.description: Cause a massive earthquake in a large area, dealing damage, stunning, and slowing all enemies within.

stoneFleshAura.name: Stone Flesh Aura
stoneFleshAura.description: Project an aura that hardens the skin of nearby allies, granting them increased armor.

boulderHurl.name: Boulder Hurl
boulderHurl.description: Magically form and hurl a massive boulder at a target, dealing high damage and stunning them.

fortifyDefenses.name: Fortify Defenses
fortifyDefenses.description: Greatly increase the armor and block chance of a single ally, turning them into a temporary bastion.

graspingEarth.name: Grasping Earth
graspingEarth.description: Command the earth to grasp at enemies in an area, dealing minor damage and rooting them in place.

summonStoneGuardian.name: Summon Stone Guardian
summonStoneGuardian.description: Summon a mighty Stone Guardian. This minion is incredibly durable and can taunt multiple enemies.

glacialSpike.name: Glacial Spike
glacialSpike.description: Summon a massive spike of glacial ice to impale a target. Deals bonus damage to frozen enemies, shattering them.

frozenGround.name: Frozen Ground
frozenGround.description: Freeze the ground in a large area, dealing minor damage and creating difficult terrain that severely slows enemies and may cause them to slip (stun).

iceboundEarth.name: Icebound Earth
iceboundEarth.description: Enemies hit by this earthen attack become chilled and brittle, increasing their vulnerability to physical damage.

permafrostArmor.name: Permafrost Armor
permafrostArmor.description: Encase an ally in armor of permafrost, granting high armor and ice resistance, and chilling melee attackers.

shatteringEarthquake.name: Shattering Earthquake
shatteringEarthquake.description: An earthquake that sends shards of ice flying, dealing both Earth and Ice damage to all enemies in the area.

frostbiteQuake.name: Frostbite Quake
frostbiteQuake.description: A localized quake that applies a magical frostbite to enemies, dealing Ice damage over time.

rimeStone.name: Rime Stone
rimeStone.description: Launch a stone covered in rimefrost. Deals Ice damage and applies a powerful Chill.

summonIceGolem.name: Summon Ice Golem
summonIceGolem.description: Summon a golem made of ice and rock. It is durable and its attacks chill enemies.

steamGeyser.name: Steam Geyser
steamGeyser.description: Summon a powerful geyser of steam and muddy water, damaging and slowing enemies in an area.

mudPotEruption.name: Mud Pot Eruption
mudPotEruption.description: Cause a pot of boiling mud to erupt, dealing Earth damage and burning enemies with scalding mud.

scaldingEarth.name: Scalding Earth
scaldingEarth.description: Superheat the ground, creating a zone that deals continuous steam damage and reduces enemy fire resistance.

thermalBarrier.name: Thermal Barrier
thermalBarrier.description: Create a barrier of shimmering heat around an ally that provides resistance to Fire and Water damage and has a chance to daze melee attackers.

boilingMud.name: Boiling Mud
boilingMud.description: Hurl a glob of boiling mud that deals Earth damage, burns, and slows the target.

vaporizeGround.name: Vaporize Ground
vaporizeGround.description: Instantly vaporize moisture in the ground, creating a blast of steam that damages enemies and reduces their accuracy.

steamInfusedStone.name: Steam-Infused Stone
steamInfusedStone.description: Launch a stone superheated with steam. It deals heavy blunt damage and explodes on impact, dealing Steam damage to nearby enemies.

runeOfEarthquake.name: Rune of Earthquake
runeOfEarthquake.description: Inscribe a rune on the ground that triggers a powerful earthquake when an enemy approaches, stunning them.

stoneGlyphTrap.name: Stone Glyph Trap
stoneGlyphTrap.description: Set a glyph trap that, when triggered, encases the enemy in stone, rooting them and dealing damage over time.

empowerWithRunesEarth.name: Empower with Runes (Earth)
empowerWithRunesEarth.description: Inscribe temporary runes of power, enhancing the damage and control effects of your Earth spells.

earthenWardRune.name: Earthen Ward Rune
earthenWardRune.description: Inscribe a protective rune on an ally, granting them a shield of rock that absorbs physical damage.

chainRuneQuake.name: Chain Rune Quake
chainRuneQuake.description: Launch a resonant rune that causes a tremor on impact and chains to nearby enemies, triggering smaller quakes.

runeOfPetrification.name: Rune of Petrification
runeOfPetrification.description: Place a powerful rune trap that attempts to petrify any enemy who triggers it.

decipherEarthRune.name: Decipher Earth Rune
decipherEarthRune.description: Channel deep runic knowledge, greatly increasing Earth spell power and the duration of your Earth runes.

terraformingGlyph.name: Terraforming Glyph
terraformingGlyph.description: Inscribe a powerful glyph on the battlefield that slowly transforms the terrain, creating difficult ground for enemies and healing ground for allies.

bloodstoneShard.name: Bloodstone Shard
bloodstoneShard.description: Sacrifice health to hurl a shard of blood-infused rock. Deals Earth damage and causes the target to bleed.

animateBloodRock.name: Animate Blood Rock
animateBloodRock.description: Animate a golem of rock and gore by sacrificing a large portion of your health. It is durable and has lifesteal on its attacks.

hemomanticFissure.name: Hemomantic Fissure
hemomanticFissure.description: Tear open a fissure filled with boiling blood, damaging and slowing enemies within it.

sanguineQuake.name: Sanguine Quake
sanguineQuake.description: Sacrifice health to trigger an earthquake that deals Earth damage and drains life from all enemies hit, healing you.

lifebloodGeomancy.name: Lifeblood Geomancy
lifebloodGeomancy.description: Empower your connection to earth with your lifeblood. For a duration, your Earth spells have lifesteal.

drainEssenceEarth.name: Drain Essence (Earth)
drainEssenceEarth.description: Drain vitality from an enemy with earthen magic, dealing damage and healing yourself for each tick.

bloodboundEarthworks.name: Bloodbound Earthworks
bloodboundEarthworks.description: Raise a wall of blood-soaked earth that damages enemies who touch it and grants lifesteal to allies who attack through it.

crimsonPillar.name: Crimson Pillar
crimsonPillar.description: Summon a pillar of solidified blood that pulses, dealing damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby allies.

raiseEarthenUndead.name: Raise Earthen Undead
raiseEarthenUndead.description: Raise a slow but incredibly durable skeleton from the very earth.

corruptLand.name: Corrupt Land
corruptLand.description: Corrupt a patch of land with necromantic energy. Enemies on it take damage and have their healing reduced. Your undead minions on it are healed.

boneSpikesFromEarth.name: Bone Spikes from Earth
boneSpikesFromEarth.description: Cause jagged bone spikes to erupt from the ground, dealing Physical (Pierce) damage to all enemies in an area and causing them to bleed.

necroticTremor.name: Necrotic Tremor
necroticTremor.description: A tremor that carries necrotic energy, dealing Earth and Necrotic damage and weakening enemies' Strength.

gravedirtBlast.name: Gravedirt Blast
gravedirtBlast.description: Hurl a chunk of cursed gravedirt that explodes, dealing damage and applying a disease that reduces vitality.

animateStoneZombie.name: Animate Stone Zombie
animateStoneZombie.description: Animate a corpse, encasing it in rock to create a slow but tough Stone Zombie.

soulSiphonEarth.name: Soul Siphon (Earth)
soulSiphonEarth.description: Rip the soul from a dying enemy to restore a large amount of mana. The empty shell may rise as a weak zombie.

tombstoneEruption.name: Tombstone Eruption
tombstoneEruption.description: Cause tombstones to erupt from the ground in an area, dealing damage. Has a chance to summon a skeleton from each tombstone.

stonebarkSkin.name: Stonebark Skin
stonebarkSkin.description: Grant an ally skin as tough as stone and bark, greatly increasing their armor and granting physical resistance.

livingRockGuardian.name: Living Rock Guardian
livingRockGuardian.description: Summon a guardian made of living rock and wood. It is extremely durable and regenerates health over time.

entanglingRootsEarth.name: Entangling Roots (Earth)
entanglingRootsEarth.description: Roots as strong as stone erupt to entangle all enemies in an area, dealing damage and rooting them.

healingGroveEarth.name: Healing Grove (Earth)
healingGroveEarth.description: Create a sacred grove of petrified wood. Allies inside are healed over time and gain damage reduction.

naturesWrathEarth.name: Nature's Wrath (Earth)
naturesWrathEarth.description: Call nature's wrath upon a foe, striking them with stone-hard thorns that deal both Nature and Earth damage.

brambleWallStone.name: Bramble Wall (Stone)
brambleWallStone.description: Raise a wall of petrified brambles. It damages and slows enemies who pass through it.

summonEarthTreant.name: Summon Earth Treant
summonEarthTreant.description: Summon a mighty Treant with bark as hard as stone, capable of taunting enemies and withstanding great punishment.

photosynthesisEarth.name: Photosynthesis (Earth)
photosynthesisEarth.description: Draw energy from the earth and sun, restoring mana over time. The effect is stronger if you haven't moved.

earthDrain.name: Earth Drain
earthDrain.description: Drain the vital essence of the earth from a target, dealing continuous Earth damage and healing yourself.

geodePulse.name: Geode Pulse
geodePulse.description: Unleash a pulse of energy from a geode, damaging nearby enemies and granting a small life shield to nearby allies.

siphonStone.name: Siphon Stone
siphonStone.description: Strike a foe with enchanted stone that siphons their strength, dealing damage and temporarily reducing their armor while increasing yours.

crystalLeech.name: Crystal Leech
crystalLeech.description: Implant a crystal leech in an enemy. It deals damage over time and transfers the health to you.

vitalityCrush.name: Vitality Crush
vitalityCrush.description: Crush a foe with earthen power, dealing damage and healing you for a percentage of their missing health.

petrifyingSiphon.name: Petrifying Siphon
petrifyingSiphon.description: Begin to petrify an enemy, dealing damage over time. If they die from this effect, you receive a massive heal.

heartstoneLink.name: Heartstone Link
heartstoneLink.description: Link your life force with an ally through a heartstone. A portion of all healing you receive from your lifesteal effects is also granted to them.

rejuvenatingEarth.name: Rejuvenating Earth
rejuvenatingEarth.description: Draw rejuvenating energy from the earth, healing all allies in an area over time.

scaldingTide.name: Scalding Tide
scaldingTide.description: Unleash a tide of scalding water mixed with lava, dealing Steam and Fire damage to all enemies in a cone.

lavaWave.name: Lava Wave
lavaWave.description: Summon a wave of pure lava to crash over enemies, dealing high Fire damage and leaving a trail of molten ground.

hydrovolcanicBlast.name: Hydrovolcanic Blast
hydrovolcanicBlast.description: Cause water to flash-boil beneath the ground, resulting in a massive hydrovolcanic explosion. Deals high Steam damage and stuns enemies.

obsidianRain.name: Obsidian Rain
obsidianRain.description: Summon a rain of supercooled lava shards that solidify into obsidian, peppering an area. Deals Physical (Pierce) damage and causes bleeding.

steamEruption.name: Steam Eruption
steamEruption.description: Create a sudden eruption of steam from a water source or Drenched target, damaging and disorienting nearby enemies.

geothermalCurrent.name: Geothermal Current
geothermalCurrent.description: Create a current of superheated water that damages enemies in a line and pulls them along its path.

magmaGeyser.name: Magma Geyser
magmaGeyser.description: Summon a geyser of pure magma to erupt beneath an enemy, dealing high Fire damage and leaving them burning.

boilingSurge.name: Boiling Surge
boilingSurge.description: Surge forward in a wave of boiling water, damaging enemies and granting you a temporary speed boost.

mudWave.name: Mud Wave
mudWave.description: Send a wave of thick mud to crash over enemies, dealing Earth damage and severely slowing them.

stoneEncaseWaterElemental.name: Encase Water Elemental in Stone
stoneEncaseWaterElemental.description: Summon a water elemental and immediately encase it in a suit of rock armor, creating a durable, damaging minion.

tidalRockslide.name: Tidal Rockslide
tidalRockslide.description: Summon a tidal wave of rocks and water that crashes down in an area, dealing damage and stunning enemies.

waterStoneShield.name: Water Stone Shield
waterStoneShield.description: Create a shield on an ally made of flowing water and solid rock, granting both armor and a small amount of health regeneration.

geyserOfStone.name: Geyser of Stone
geyserOfStone.description: Cause a geyser of sharp stones to erupt from the ground, dealing high damage and knocking a target up.

liquidEarth.name: Liquid Earth
liquidEarth.description: Turn the ground in an area into a thick, inescapable mire, heavily rooting all enemies within it.

siltPrison.name: Silt Prison
siltPrison.description: Encase a single enemy in a prison of hardened silt, dealing damage over time and stunning them for the duration.

coralSpikes.name: Coral Spikes
coralSpikes.description: Summon sharp coral spikes from the ground to impale an enemy, dealing damage and causing them to bleed.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Conjure a raging blizzard over a large area, dealing continuous Ice damage and severely slowing enemies within.

icebergSlam.name: Iceberg Slam
icebergSlam.description: Summon a small iceberg to crash down on your enemies, dealing massive damage and freezing them solid.

frozenTsunami.name: Frozen Tsunami
frozenTsunami.description: Send a wave of half-frozen water crashing over enemies, dealing Ice and Water damage and pushing them back.

flashFreezeWave.name: Flash Freeze Wave
flashFreezeWave.description: Release a wave of absolute cold, damaging and freezing enemies in a cone.

glacialArmor.name: Glacial Armor
glacialArmor.description: Encase yourself in armor of solid ice, granting immense armor and causing melee attackers to become chilled.

winterGrasp.name: Winter's Grasp
winterGrasp.description: Winter's cold grasps an enemy, dealing damage over time and severely reducing their speed.

iceFlow.name: Ice Flow
iceFlow.description: Slide on a path of ice, increasing your movement speed and allowing you to cast your next spell while moving.

summonWaterElementalIce.name: Summon Ice Elemental
summonWaterElementalIce.description: Summon a powerful Ice Elemental that chills and freezes enemies with its attacks.

chargedWaterspout.name: Charged Waterspout
chargedWaterspout.description: Summon a waterspout crackling with lightning. Deals Water and Lightning damage and can stun.

lightningMaelstrom.name: Lightning Maelstrom
lightningMaelstrom.description: Create a maelstrom of electrified water that pulls enemies in, continuously damaging them with Water and Lightning.

shockingDeluge.name: Shocking Deluge
shockingDeluge.description: Call down a deluge of electrified rain, damaging all enemies and reducing their lightning resistance.

electrifiedTide.name: Electrified Tide
electrifiedTide.description: Send a wave of electrified water that damages enemies and has a chance to chain lightning between them.

staticWhirlpool.name: Static Whirlpool
staticWhirlpool.description: Create a whirlpool that pulls a single enemy in, dealing water damage and applying a static charge that damages them when they attack.

thunderstormAtSea.name: Thunderstorm at Sea
thunderstormAtSea.description: Summon a massive thunderstorm over an area, pelting it with rain and random, powerful lightning strikes.

voltaicCurrent.name: Voltaic Current
voltaicCurrent.description: Channel a current of electricity through a water-logged enemy, dealing high damage. More effective on Drenched targets.

stormSurge.name: Storm Surge
stormSurge.description: Embrace the storm, granting yourself a temporary shield of swirling water and lightning that damages attackers.

runeOfTides.name: Rune of Tides
runeOfTides.description: Inscribe a rune that, when triggered, creates a powerful tide that pushes enemies away from the rune.

waterGlyphTrap.name: Water Glyph Trap
waterGlyphTrap.description: Set a glyph trap that erupts in a blast of water when triggered, damaging and drenching the target.

empowerWithRunesWater.name: Empower with Runes (Water)
empowerWithRunesWater.description: Inscribe temporary runes of power, enhancing the healing and slowing effects of your Water spells.

aquaticWardRune.name: Aquatic Ward Rune
aquaticWardRune.description: Inscribe a protective rune on an ally that grants them a shield of water, increasing their resistance to fire and healing them when it breaks.

chainRuneFlood.name: Chain Rune Flood
chainRuneFlood.description: Launch a rune of water that floods the target and chains to nearby enemies, drenching them all.

runeOfDrowning.name: Rune of Drowning
runeOfDrowning.description: Place a powerful rune that creates a sphere of water around the triggering enemy, damaging them over time and silencing them.

decipherWaterRune.name: Decipher Water Rune
decipherWaterRune.description: Channel deep runic knowledge, greatly increasing the power of your Water spells and causing them to restore mana on cast.

tidalGlyph.name: Tidal Glyph
tidalGlyph.description: Attach a glyph to a target that pulses with tidal energy, periodically pushing them and nearby enemies away.

bloodWaterWhip.name: Blood Water Whip
bloodWaterWhip.description: Lash out with a whip of blood-infused water, dealing damage and healing you for a portion of the damage dealt.

crimsonTide.name: Crimson Tide
crimsonTide.description: Unleash a tide of blood that damages all enemies and applies a bleed effect. You are healed for each enemy hit.

summonBloodKrakenTentacle.name: Summon Blood Kraken Tentacle
summonBloodKrakenTentacle.description: Sacrifice a large amount of health to summon a horrific tentacle of a Blood Kraken, which attacks and drains life from enemies.

sanguineCurrent.name: Sanguine Current
sanguineCurrent.description: Create a current of blood that pulls an enemy towards you and applies a curse that causes them to take damage when they heal.

lifebloodDeluge.name: Lifeblood Deluge
lifebloodDeluge.description: Sacrifice health to unleash a deluge of life-giving water, healing all allies in a large area.

drainVitalityWater.name: Drain Vitality (Water)
drainVitalityWater.description: Drain an enemy's vitality with a torrent of water, dealing damage and healing yourself.

boilingBloodGeyser.name: Boiling Blood Geyser
boilingBloodGeyser.description: Cause a geyser of your own boiling blood to erupt under an enemy, dealing high Shadow damage.

forbiddenDepths.name: Forbidden Depths
forbiddenDepths.description: Call upon the forbidden depths, creating a massive whirlpool that damages enemies and has a chance to summon a horror from the abyss.

summonDrownedSpirit.name: Summon Drowned Spirit
summonDrownedSpirit.description: Summon the vengeful spirit of one who drowned. It attacks with chilling touch and can slow enemies.

spectralTide.name: Spectral Tide
spectralTide.description: Unleash a tide of spectral energy that damages enemies and has a chance to fear them.

necroticCurrent.name: Necrotic Current
necroticCurrent.description: Create a current that deals Necrotic damage over time and reduces healing received.

animateWaterloggedCorpse.name: Animate Waterlogged Corpse
animateWaterloggedCorpse.description: Raise a waterlogged corpse as a bloated, durable zombie that explodes on death, damaging and slowing enemies.

callOfTheDeep.name: Call of the Deep
callOfTheDeep.description: Call upon spirits from the deep, granting all your undead minions a chilling aura that damages nearby enemies.

soulAnchor.name: Soul Anchor
soulAnchor.description: Anchor an enemy's soul to a location, dealing shadow damage and preventing them from moving.

ghostlyFog.name: Ghostly Fog
ghostlyFog.description: Summon a ghostly fog that reduces enemy accuracy and has a chance to fear them when they enter.

whispersOfTheDrowned.name: Whispers of the Drowned
whispersOfTheDrowned.description: Fill an enemy's mind with the whispers of the drowned, silencing them and reducing their magic resistance.

coralGrowth.name: Coral Growth
coralGrowth.description: Cause sharp coral to grow in an area, creating difficult terrain that damages and slows enemies.

summonSeaCreature.name: Summon Sea Creature
summonSeaCreature.description: Summon a random sea creature to aid you, such as a snapping turtle or a giant crab.

healingWatersNature.name: Healing Waters (Nature)
healingWatersNature.description: Create a pool of life-infused water that heals allies within it and grants them regeneration.

entanglingKelp.name: Entangling Kelp
entanglingKelp.description: Summon magical kelp to entangle and root an enemy.

tidalBloom.name: Tidal Bloom
tidalBloom.description: Cause a massive aquatic flower to bloom, healing all allies and removing one poison or disease effect.

aquaticCamouflage.name: Aquatic Camouflage
aquaticCamouflage.description: Blend in with watery surroundings, granting you stealth and increased mana regeneration.

bioluminescentPulse.name: Bioluminescent Pulse
bioluminescentPulse.description: Release a pulse of light that reveals stealthed enemies and reduces the accuracy of all enemies in a wide area.

songOfTheOcean.name: Song of the Ocean
songOfTheOcean.description: Sing a soothing song that grants all allies increased resistance to magic and heals them over time.

siphoningTide.name: Siphoning Tide
siphoningTide.description: Unleash a tide that damages enemies and pulls their life force back to you, healing you for a portion of the damage dealt to each target.

leechingWaterspout.name: Leeching Waterspout
leechingWaterspout.description: Summon a waterspout on an enemy that deals damage and transfers health to a nearby ally with the lowest health.

essenceDrainWater.name: Essence Drain (Water)
essenceDrainWater.description: Drain an enemy's essence with a torrent of water, dealing damage and healing yourself.

vitalityVortex.name: Vitality Vortex
vitalityVortex.description: Create a vortex that drains health from enemies within and redistributes it among allies inside the vortex.

aquaticParasite.name: Aquatic Parasite
aquaticParasite.description: Inflict a target with an aquatic parasite that deals damage over time and heals you for the same amount.

drowningGrasp.name: Drowning Grasp
drowningGrasp.description: Grasp a foe with watery tendrils, dealing damage and healing you. The healing is increased if the target is below 50% health.

bloodWaterBond.name: Blood Water Bond
bloodWaterBond.description: Bond your life force with an ally through a watery medium. For a duration, a portion of the healing you receive is also granted to them.

refreshingCurrents.name: Refreshing Currents
refreshingCurrents.description: Wash over an ally with refreshing currents, healing them and granting them a small amount of mana.

fireTornado.name: Fire Tornado
fireTornado.description: Conjure a tornado of fire that travels across the battlefield, pulling in enemies and dealing heavy fire damage over time.

ashCloud.name: Ash Cloud
ashCloud.description: Create a blinding cloud of hot ash, dealing minor damage and severely reducing the accuracy and magic resistance of enemies within.

lavaGale.name: Lava Gale
lavaGale.description: Unleash a gale of wind carrying molten rock, dealing both Fire and Air damage to enemies in a cone.

cinderCyclone.name: Cinder Cyclone
cinderCyclone.description: Whip up a cyclone of cinders around an enemy, dealing damage over time and reducing their armor.

magmaInfusedWind.name: Magma-Infused Wind
magmaInfusedWind.description: Infuse your next Air spell with the power of magma, adding Fire damage and a burning effect to it.

volcanicUpdraft.name: Volcanic Updraft
volcanicUpdraft.description: Create a powerful updraft of superheated air, dealing damage and launching a single enemy into the air.

burningZephyr.name: Burning Zephyr
burningZephyr.description: Empower yourself with a burning wind, increasing your speed and causing your melee attacks to deal bonus fire damage.

emberstorm.name: Emberstorm
emberstorm.description: Whip up a storm of embers that continuously damages and burns enemies in a large area.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: Conjure a blinding sandstorm that deals continuous physical damage and severely reduces the accuracy of all enemies within it.

stoneShardVolley.name: Stone Shard Volley
stoneShardVolley.description: Launch a volley of magically sharpened stone shards at a group of enemies.

blindingGust.name: Blinding Gust
blindingGust.description: A powerful gust of sandy wind that damages and blinds a single target.

erodingWind.name: Eroding Wind
erodingWind.description: Blast an enemy with abrasive winds that deal damage and reduce their armor.

summonSandElemental.name: Summon Sand Elemental
summonSandElemental.description: Summon an elemental of living sand. It can blind enemies and its form makes it difficult to hit.

desertMirage.name: Desert Mirage
desertMirage.description: Create a mirage of yourself to confuse enemies, increasing your dodge chance and causing enemies to sometimes attack the mirage instead.

quicksandTrap.name: Quicksand Trap
quicksandTrap.description: Turn a patch of ground into quicksand, severely rooting enemies who enter it.

windSculptedStone.name: Wind-Sculpted Stone
windSculptedStone.description: Launch a piece of stone sculpted by wind into a sharp projectile. It travels with high velocity and has increased critical chance.

iceStorm.name: Ice Storm
iceStorm.description: Create a swirling storm of ice and wind in an area that deals continuous Ice damage and reduces enemies' Fire resistance.

freezingGale.name: Freezing Gale
freezingGale.description: Unleash a gale of freezing wind that damages enemies in a cone and applies a powerful chill.

hailBarrage.name: Hail Barrage
hailBarrage.description: Summon a barrage of hailstones to pummel an area, repeatedly damaging enemies within.

hoarfrostCoating.name: Hoarfrost Coating
hoarfrostCoating.description: Coat an ally's weapon in hoarfrost. Their attacks deal bonus Ice damage and chill targets.

rimeWind.name: Rime Wind
rimeWind.description: A biting wind that deals Ice damage and applies a stack of Rime, increasing damage taken from your subsequent Ice spells.

arcticBlast.name: Arctic Blast
arcticBlast.description: Unleash a blast of arctic air that deals high Ice damage and has a chance to freeze the target solid.

blizzardConjuration.name: Blizzard Conjuration
blizzardConjuration.description: Begin conjuring a massive blizzard. After a short channel, a powerful blizzard is unleashed, dealing immense damage and freezing all enemies.

chillOfTheNorthWind.name: Chill of the North Wind
chillOfTheNorthWind.description: The north wind chills an enemy to the bone, significantly reducing their attack speed and damage resistance.

chainLightningStorm.name: Chain Lightning Storm
chainLightningStorm.description: Unleash a bolt of lightning that chains between up to 5 enemies, with each jump dealing slightly less damage.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: Call down a massive thunderbolt, dealing high damage and stunning a single target.

summonStormCloud.name: Summon Storm Cloud
summonStormCloud.description: Summon a mobile storm cloud that follows an enemy, periodically zapping them with lightning.

rideTheLightning.name: Ride the Lightning
rideTheLightning.description: Transform into a bolt of lightning and dash to a location, damaging all enemies you pass through.

galeForceLightning.name: Gale Force Lightning
galeForceLightning.description: A blast of lightning carried on a gale, damaging and knocking back enemies in a cone.

ballLightningSwarm.name: Ball Lightning Swarm
ballLightningSwarm.description: Release a swarm of slow-moving ball lightning that zap nearby enemies.

eyeOfTheStormSelf.name: Eye of the Storm
eyeOfTheStormSelf.description: Become the eye of the storm. You gain a protective barrier of wind, and your lightning spells cost less mana and have increased critical chance.

skywrathAura.name: Skywrath Aura
skywrathAura.description: Unleash the wrath of the sky, creating an aura that causes random lightning strikes around you and empowers your Air and Lightning damage.

steamVortex.name: Steam Vortex
steamVortex.description: Create a vortex of steam and wind that pulls enemies in, damaging them and reducing their fire resistance.

obscuringMist.name: Obscuring Mist
obscuringMist.description: Blanket an area in a thick, magical mist. Enemies have their accuracy and movement speed reduced. Allies gain evasion.

scaldingWind.name: Scalding Wind
scaldingWind.description: A blast of scalding wind that damages an enemy and leaves them with a burn.

vaporizeAir.name: Vaporize (Air)
vaporizeAir.description: Briefly turn into vapor, becoming highly evasive and immune to physical damage.

mistralUpdraft.name: Mistral Updraft
mistralUpdraft.description: Create an updraft that lifts an ally or yourself, granting temporary flight and increased speed.

pressureBlast.name: Pressure Blast
pressureBlast.description: A highly compressed blast of air and steam that deals high damage and knocks the target back.

cloudburst.name: Cloudburst
cloudburst.description: Cause a sudden cloudburst, drenching all enemies, dealing water damage, and reducing their fire resistance.

airCurrentControl.name: Air Current Control
airCurrentControl.description: Manipulate air currents to grant an ally increased speed or an enemy reduced speed.

runeOfGales.name: Rune of Gales
runeOfGales.description: Inscribe a rune that unleashes a powerful gale when triggered, pushing all nearby enemies away and dealing Air damage.

lightningGlyphTrapAir.name: Lightning Glyph Trap (Air)
lightningGlyphTrapAir.description: Set a glyph trap that erupts with lightning when triggered, damaging and stunning the victim.

empowerWithRunesAir.name: Empower with Runes (Air)
empowerWithRunesAir.description: Inscribe temporary runes of power, enhancing the damage and control effects of your Air and Lightning spells.

windWardRune.name: Wind Ward Rune
windWardRune.description: Inscribe a protective rune on an ally that deflects projectiles and increases their movement speed.

chainRuneStorm.name: Chain Rune Storm
chainRuneStorm.description: Launch a rune of lightning that chains between enemies, dealing damage with each jump.

runeOfSilenceAir.name: Rune of Silence (Air)
runeOfSilenceAir.description: Place a rune that creates a zone of absolute silence when triggered, preventing all spellcasting within it.

decipherSkyRune.name: Decipher Sky Rune
decipherSkyRune.description: Channel deep runic knowledge, greatly increasing Air and Lightning spell power and reducing their cooldowns.

cycloneGlyph.name: Cyclone Glyph
cycloneGlyph.description: Attach a glyph to a target that erupts into a small cyclone, damaging them and nearby enemies.

bloodWind.name: Blood Wind
bloodWind.description: Sacrifice health to unleash a wind of draining energy that deals Shadow damage and weakens enemy armor.

crimsonCyclone.name: Crimson Cyclone
crimsonCyclone.description: Sacrifice a significant portion of health to create a cyclone of blood that damages enemies and heals allies inside.

sanguineGale.name: Sanguine Gale
sanguineGale.description: A gale that leeches life, damaging enemies and healing you for a portion of the damage dealt.

lifeDrainGust.name: Life Drain Gust
lifeDrainGust.description: Channel a gust of wind that continuously drains life from a single target.

hemomanticStorm.name: Hemomantic Storm
hemomanticStorm.description: Sacrifice health to conjure a storm of blood and lightning, dealing Shadow and Lightning damage to all enemies.

sacrificeForTempest.name: Sacrifice for Tempest
sacrificeForTempest.description: Sacrifice health to empower your next Air or Lightning spell, adding a lifesteal component to it.

vampiricZephyr.name: Vampiric Zephyr
vampiricZephyr.description: Surround yourself with a zephyr that drains life from nearby enemies and transfers it to you.

forbiddenSky.name: Forbidden Sky
forbiddenSky.description: Perform a forbidden ritual, sacrificing a large amount of health to call down a blood-red sky that leeches life from all enemies for a long duration.

summonSylph.name: Summon Sylph
summonSylph.description: Summon a graceful Sylph, a nature spirit of the air. It can create healing breezes for allies and buffet enemies.

healingWind.name: Healing Wind
healingWind.description: Summon a gentle, healing wind that washes over all allies, restoring health and removing a minor debuff.

entanglingGale.name: Entangling Gale
entanglingGale.description: A gale infused with living vines that damages enemies in a cone and roots them.

naturesBreath.name: Nature's Breath
naturesBreath.description: Exhale a breath of pure life energy, healing allies in front of you and granting them a regeneration effect.

thornedCyclone.name: Thorned Cyclone
thornedCyclone.description: Create a cyclone of razor-sharp thorns and leaves, dealing continuous Physical and Nature damage to enemies within.

skybloom.name: Skybloom
skybloom.description: Cause a magical flower to bloom on an ally, healing them and increasing their magic resistance.

whisperingWinds.name: Whispering Winds
whisperingWinds.description: The winds whisper secrets to your allies, increasing their dodge and accuracy.

aerieShield.name: Aerie Shield
aerieShield.description: Summon a protective shield of wind and leaves around an ally, absorbing damage and making them immune to knockback.

siphoningGust.name: Siphoning Gust
siphoningGust.description: Channel a gust of wind that siphons life force from a target, dealing Air damage and healing you.

leechingCyclone.name: Leeching Cyclone
leechingCyclone.description: Create a cyclone that damages enemies and transfers a portion of the health drained to nearby allies.

essenceDrainWind.name: Essence Drain (Wind)
essenceDrainWind.description: A powerful gust that drains the very essence of a foe, dealing damage and healing you for a large amount.

vitalityVortexAir.name: Vitality Vortex (Air)
vitalityVortexAir.description: A swirling vortex of air that saps the vitality of enemies, damaging them and healing you.

aerialParasite.name: Aerial Parasite
aerialParasite.description: Inflict a foe with an airy parasite that deals damage over time and transfers the health to you.

suffocatingCurrents.name: Suffocating Currents
suffocatingCurrents.description: Create currents of thin air around an enemy, dealing damage and silencing them.

bloodWindBond.name: Blood Wind Bond
bloodWindBond.description: Bond with an ally through a sanguine wind. A portion of the healing you receive from lifesteal is also granted to them.

refreshingBreeze.name: Refreshing Breeze
refreshingBreeze.description: A gentle breeze washes over allies, granting them a small heal over time effect.

summonSkeletonHorde.name: Summon Skeleton Horde
summonSkeletonHorde.description: Summon a horde of 4 basic but numerous skeletons to overwhelm your enemies.

raiseSpecter.name: Raise Specter
raiseSpecter.description: Raise the specter of a fallen foe. It is ethereal, resistant to physical damage, and attacks with chilling touch.

animateGreaterDead.name: Animate Greater Dead
animateGreaterDead.description: Animate a powerful undead servant, such as a Skeletal Knight or a Ghoul, from a strong corpse.

undeadLegion.name: Undead Legion
undeadLegion.description: Bolster your undead legion, granting all your summoned minions increased damage and health regeneration.

empowerUndeadArmy.name: Empower Undead Army
empowerUndeadArmy.description: Imbue your entire undead army with dark power, increasing their attack and movement speed.

controlUndeadSwarm.name: Control Undead Swarm
controlUndeadSwarm.description: Direct your entire undead swarm to focus their attacks on a single target.

deathPactSummon.name: Death Pact (Summon)
deathPactSummon.description: Sacrifice an undead minion to heal yourself for a large amount.

sacrificeUndeadForPower.name: Sacrifice for Power
sacrificeUndeadForPower.description: Sacrifice an undead minion to grant yourself a significant boost to your magic power.

callOfTheWildPack.name: Call of the Wild Pack
callOfTheWildPack.description: Summon a pack of 3 loyal Spirit Wolves to fight by your side.

summonNatureGuardian.name: Summon Nature Guardian
summonNatureGuardian.description: Summon a powerful Nature Guardian, such as a large bear or an ancient treant, to protect you.

awakenTheForest.name: Awaken the Forest
awakenTheForest.description: Awaken the forest in a large area. Trees become temporary, taunting minions and roots erupt to ensnare enemies.

beastialEmpowerment.name: Beastial Empowerment
beastialEmpowerment.description: Grant a powerful blessing to all your summoned beasts, increasing their damage, health, and speed.

naturesAlly.name: Nature's Ally
naturesAlly.description: Form a deep bond with one of your summoned beasts, healing it to full and making it immune to damage for a short time.

spiritTotem.name: Spirit Totem
spiritTotem.description: Place a spirit totem that provides a beneficial aura, such as healing, mana regeneration, or increased armor, to nearby allies.

entanglingVinesSummon.name: Entangling Vines
entanglingVinesSummon.description: Summon entangling vines that erupt from the ground, rooting all enemies in an area.

wildGrowthSummon.name: Wild Growth
wildGrowthSummon.description: Cause explosive plant growth in an area, healing allies and creating difficult terrain for enemies.

summonBloodFiend.name: Summon Blood Fiend
summonBloodFiend.description: Summon a fiend made of pure blood by sacrificing your own health. It has lifesteal and explodes on death.

animateBloodGolem.name: Animate Blood Golem
animateBloodGolem.description: Animate a large, durable golem of blood from a corpse. It constantly drains life from nearby enemies to heal itself.

bloodPactRitual.name: Blood Pact Ritual
bloodPactRitual.description: Perform a ritual that links you to your summoned minions. They gain damage, but a portion of the damage they take is transferred to you.

sanguineEmpowerment.name: Sanguine Empowerment
sanguineEmpowerment.description: Sacrifice health to empower a minion, granting it massive lifesteal for a short duration.

lifebloodLink.name: Lifeblood Link
lifebloodLink.description: Link your life force to a minion. You can sacrifice your health to heal it, or sacrifice its health to heal yourself.

sacrificialSummoning.name: Sacrificial Summoning
sacrificialSummoning.description: Sacrifice a minion to instantly finish the cooldown of another summon spell.

crimsonPortal.name: Crimson Portal
crimsonPortal.description: Open a portal dripping with blood. Periodically summons weak, temporary blood creatures.

bindByBlood.name: Bind by Blood
bindByBlood.description: Attempt to bind an enemy with tendrils of blood, rooting them and dealing damage over time.

arcaneLavaBolt.name: Arcane Lava Bolt
arcaneLavaBolt.description: Launch a bolt of lava supercharged with arcane energy, dealing both Fire and Arcane damage.

magmaInfusionArcane.name: Magma Infusion (Arcane)
magmaInfusionArcane.description: Infuse an ally with the power of arcane magma, granting their attacks bonus Fire damage and a chance to reduce enemy armor.

volatileEruption.name: Volatile Eruption
volatileEruption.description: Cause a volatile arcane-fueled eruption, dealing high Fire and Arcane damage and leaving unstable ground that has a chance to explode again.

summonArcaneMagmaElemental.name: Summon Arcane Magma Elemental
summonArcaneMagmaElemental.description: Summon a powerful elemental of arcane-infused magma. It is volatile and explodes upon death.

realityWarpLava.name: Reality Warp (Lava)
realityWarpLava.description: Warp reality to turn a patch of ground into molten lava, damaging and slowing enemies within.

manaBurnLava.name: Mana Burn (Lava)
manaBurnLava.description: Sear an enemy with arcane fire that burns away their mana as well as their health.

aethericGeyser.name: Aetheric Geyser
aethericGeyser.description: Summon a geyser of pure aether and magma, dealing Arcane and Fire damage and launching enemies into the air.

crystalizedMagma.name: Crystalized Magma
crystalizedMagma.description: Hurl a glob of magma that crystallizes on impact, dealing Earth damage and rooting the target.

crystalShardsArcane.name: Arcane Crystal Shards
crystalShardsArcane.description: Launch a volley of sharp, arcane-infused crystals that pierce enemy defenses.

arcaneInfusedStoneWall.name: Arcane-Infused Stone Wall
