arcaneInfusedStoneWall.description: Raise a wall of stone infused with arcane energy. It blocks passage and damages enemies who strike it.

leylineConvergence.name: Leyline Convergence
leylineConvergence.description: Create a point of leyline convergence. Allies standing within it have their spell costs reduced.

realityAnchor.name: Reality Anchor
realityAnchor.description: Erect a monolith that anchors reality, preventing teleportation and displacement effects for all units in a large area.

aethericMonolith.name: Aetheric Monolith
aethericMonolith.description: Summon an Aetheric Monolith that pulses with arcane energy, damaging enemies and granting mana to allies.

manaCrystalTrap.name: Mana Crystal Trap
manaCrystalTrap.description: Set a trap of unstable mana crystals. When triggered, it explodes, dealing Arcane damage and burning mana from the victim.

warpStone.name: Warp Stone
warpStone.description: Hurl a stone that warps reality on impact, dealing Arcane damage and randomly teleporting the target.

animateCrystalGolem.name: Animate Crystal Golem
animateCrystalGolem.description: Animate a golem of pure arcane crystal. It is resistant to magic and its attacks can silence enemies.

arcaneIceLance.name: Arcane Ice Lance
arcaneIceLance.description: Hurl a lance of arcane-infused ice. Deals bonus damage to frozen targets, shattering the ice.

temporalStasis.name: Temporal Stasis
temporalStasis.description: Trap an enemy in a field of frozen time, rendering them completely unable to act for an extended period. The target is immune to damage while in stasis.

frozenManaShard.name: Frozen Mana Shard
frozenManaShard.description: Launch a shard of frozen mana that deals Ice damage and saps the target's arcane energy, increasing the cost of their next spell.

cryoVortex.name: Cryo-Vortex
cryoVortex.description: Create a swirling vortex of arcane cold that pulls enemies in, continuously damages them, and reduces their magic resistance.

frostburnArcana.name: Frostburn Arcana
frostburnArcana.description: A paradoxical spell that deals initial Ice damage, but leaves behind a magical frostburn that deals Arcane damage over time.

iceboundReality.name: Icebound Reality
iceboundReality.description: Coat an ally in a layer of magical ice that makes them immune to physical damage but unable to move.

shatterspell.name: Shatterspell
shatterspell.description: Shatter a magical buff on an enemy, dealing Ice damage and dispelling the effect. Deals more damage if a stronger buff is removed.

absoluteZeroField.name: Absolute Zero Field
absoluteZeroField.description: Create a field of absolute zero. Enemies inside are massively slowed and have a high chance to become frozen each turn. The field deals immense damage upon expiring.

arcaneLightning.name: Arcane Lightning
arcaneLightning.description: Unleash a bolt of arcane-infused lightning that chains to multiple enemies, dealing both Lightning and Arcane damage.

manaStorm.name: Mana Storm
manaStorm.description: Conjure a storm of raw magic that continuously burns mana from enemies within and has a chance to silence them.

electrostaticField.name: Electrostatic Field
electrostaticField.description: Create a field of static electricity that damages and slows enemies. Allies within have their attack speed increased.

realityShock.name: Reality Shock
realityShock.description: A shocking blast of warped reality that deals Arcane damage and has a chance to stun the target.

aetherBolt.name: Aether Bolt
aetherBolt.description: A focused bolt of pure aether. Deals high arcane damage and restores a small amount of mana to the caster on hit.

chargedParticleBurst.name: Charged Particle Burst
chargedParticleBurst.description: Release a burst of charged particles, dealing Lightning damage to all nearby enemies and reducing their magic resistance.

arcaneConduction.name: Arcane Conduction
arcaneConduction.description: Mark a target to become a conduit for arcane energy. For a duration, all single-target Arcane and Lightning spells you cast on other enemies will also strike the marked target for a percentage of the damage.

overloadMana.name: Overload Mana
overloadMana.description: Overload your mana circuits. Your next Arcane or Lightning spell will be a guaranteed critical hit, but you will take a small amount of damage from the backlash.

effects.name: Overloaded
effects.description: Next Arcane/Lightning spell is a guaranteed crit.

aethericSteamBlast.name: Aetheric Steam Blast
aethericSteamBlast.description: A blast of steam infused with raw arcane energy. Deals Steam and Arcane damage and has a chance to silence the target.

manaFog.name: Mana Fog
manaFog.description: Create a dense fog of arcane energy. Enemies within have their mana drained, and allies have their mana restored.

arcaneGeyser.name: Arcane Geyser
arcaneGeyser.description: Summon a geyser of pure arcane energy that erupts, dealing damage and pushing enemies away from the center.

scaldingAether.name: Scalding Aether
scaldingAether.description: Unleash a jet of aether-infused steam that burns a target and reduces their magic resistance.

vaporizeMana.name: Vaporize Mana
vaporizeMana.description: Vaporize some of your mana into a defensive cloud, granting you a temporary shield that absorbs damage. When the shield breaks, it restores some of your mana.

pressurePointArcane.name: Pressure Point (Arcane)
pressurePointArcane.description: A focused blast of steam aimed at a pressure point, dealing damage and interrupting spellcasting.

realityMist.name: Reality Mist
realityMist.description: Create a mist that warps reality. Enemies within may randomly switch places with each other or be silenced.

manaInfusedSteam.name: Mana-Infused Steam
manaInfusedSteam.description: Unleash a cloud of mana-infused steam that damages an enemy and saps their mana, restoring yours.

runeOfArcanePower.name: Rune of Arcane Power
runeOfArcanePower.description: Inscribe a powerful rune that detonates with a massive arcane explosion when triggered.

glyphOfWardingArcane.name: Glyph of Warding (Arcane)
glyphOfWardingArcane.description: Place a glyph on an ally that grants them a potent arcane shield. When the shield breaks, it explodes, damaging nearby enemies.

realityScribe.name: Reality Scribe
realityScribe.description: Inscribe a rune that warps reality in an area, randomly applying one of several effects to enemies within: slow, silence, or damage over time.

empowerWithArcaneRunes.name: Empower with Arcane Runes
empowerWithArcaneRunes.description: Inscribe runes of power on yourself, enhancing the damage and reducing the mana cost of all your spells for a short time.

arcaneRuneTrap.name: Arcane Rune Trap
arcaneRuneTrap.description: Set a cunning trap that, when triggered, teleports the victim to a random nearby location and deals arcane damage.

chainRuneDetonation.name: Chain Rune Detonation
chainRuneDetonation.description: Launch a volatile rune that explodes and chains to other enemies marked by your runes, triggering their effects prematurely.

runeOfManaSteal.name: Rune of Mana Steal
runeOfManaSteal.description: Inscribe a rune on an enemy that siphons mana from them to you over time.

decipherAncientGlyph.name: Decipher Ancient Glyph
decipherAncientGlyph.description: Channel profound runic knowledge, greatly reducing the cooldown and mana cost of all your spells for a short time.

shadowArcanaBolt.name: Shadow Arcana Bolt
shadowArcanaBolt.description: Launch a bolt of shadow-infused arcane energy. It deals both Shadow and Arcane damage and weakens the target to both.

raiseArcaneSkeleton.name: Raise Arcane Skeleton
raiseArcaneSkeleton.description: Raise a skeleton infused with arcane energy. It is resistant to magic and its attacks burn mana.

umbralBlast.name: Umbral Blast
umbralBlast.description: Unleash a blast of pure shadow that damages and silences enemies in a cone.

necroticInfusionArcane.name: Necrotic Infusion (Arcane)
necroticInfusionArcane.description: Infuse an undead minion with arcane power, granting it a magic shield and lifesteal.

animateShadow.name: Animate Shadow
animateShadow.description: Animate the shadow of a fallen enemy to fight for you. The shadow is elusive and deals shadow damage.

soulLeechArcane.name: Soul Leech (Arcane)
soulLeechArcane.description: Leech the soul of an enemy, dealing shadow damage and restoring your mana.

veilOfShadows.name: Veil of Shadows
veilOfShadows.description: Shroud an area in shadows, reducing enemy accuracy and granting stealth to allies who enter it.

arcaneLichdomForm.name: Arcane Lichdom
arcaneLichdomForm.description: Assume the form of an arcane lich, massively increasing your magic power and mana regeneration, and making you immune to fear and curses.

leylineBloom.name: Leyline Bloom
leylineBloom.description: Cause a massive arcane-infused flower to bloom, healing all allies and granting them a temporary magic power boost.

arcaneInfusedThorns.name: Arcane-Infused Thorns
arcaneInfusedThorns.description: Summon a patch of thorns infused with arcane energy. They deal both Physical and Arcane damage to enemies within.

summonLeylineSpirit.name: Summon Leyline Spirit
summonLeylineSpirit.description: Summon a spirit of pure natural and arcane energy. It attacks with bolts of mixed energy.

naturesArcana.name: Nature's Arcana
naturesArcana.description: Unleash a bolt of nature magic that carries an arcane charge, dealing Nature damage and reducing the target's magic resistance.

verdantRealityWarp.name: Verdant Reality Warp
verdantRealityWarp.description: Warp reality to create a patch of lush, magical growth. Allies within are healed, enemies are slowed.

primalManaSurge.name: Primal Mana Surge
primalManaSurge.description: Channel a surge of primal mana, restoring a massive amount of mana to an ally at the cost of your own.

effects.description: Transfer 100 mana from the caster to the target ally.

healingLeylines.name: Healing Leylines
healingLeylines.description: Tap into the world's leylines, creating a network of healing energy that connects all allies, causing them all to regenerate health for a duration.

animateArcaneWood.name: Animate Arcane Wood
animateArcaneWood.description: Animate a powerful guardian from arcane-infused wood. It is resistant to magic and can root enemies.

arcaneSiphon.name: Arcane Siphon
arcaneSiphon.description: Siphon arcane energy and life force from a target, dealing damage and healing yourself.

aethericDrain.name: Aetheric Drain
aethericDrain.description: A potent blast of aether that damages an enemy and heals you for a large percentage of the damage dealt.

manaVampire.name: Mana Vampire
manaVampire.description: Drain a target's mana, dealing damage and restoring your own mana.

lifeTapArcana.name: Life Tap (Arcana)
lifeTapArcana.description: Sacrifice a portion of your health to restore a large amount of mana.

essenceTheft.name: Essence Theft
essenceTheft.description: Steal a beneficial magic effect from an enemy, healing yourself in the process.

soulFunnel.name: Soul Funnel
soulFunnel.description: Funnel life essence from an enemy to an ally, damaging the enemy and healing the ally over time.

realityLeech.name: Reality Leech
realityLeech.description: A leeching attack that warps reality, dealing arcane damage and stealing a random stat from the target to bolster your own.

vampiricAether.name: Vampiric Aether
vampiricAether.description: Wreathe yourself in a vampiric aether. For a duration, all your arcane spells have a significant lifesteal effect.

blessedSmite.name: Blessed Smite
blessedSmite.description: A holy smite that also bestows a minor blessing of protection on a nearby ally.

holyJudgment.name: Holy Judgment
holyJudgment.description: Call down divine judgment on a foe. Deals bonus damage if the target is debuffed, and blesses you with increased magic power if it kills the target.

divineFavor.name: Divine Favor
divineFavor.description: Call for divine favor, making your next Smite or Blessing spell a guaranteed critical hit (or critical success).

righteousWrath.name: Righteous Wrath
righteousWrath.description: For a duration, your smiting spells also heal a nearby ally for a portion of the damage dealt.

blessingOfRetribution.name: Blessing of Retribution
blessingOfRetribution.description: Bless an ally with retribution, causing them to reflect a portion of damage taken back to their attackers as Holy damage.

consecratedStrike.name: Consecrated Strike
consecratedStrike.description: Strike an enemy, consecrating the ground beneath them. Enemies on this ground take damage over time.

auraOfJustice.name: Aura of Justice
auraOfJustice.description: Project an aura of justice, causing all allies' attacks to deal bonus Holy damage.

condemnationWave.name: Condemnation Wave
condemnationWave.description: Release a wave of holy energy that condemns all enemies, dealing damage and making them more vulnerable to Holy damage.

chantOfWrath.name: Chant of Wrath
chantOfWrath.description: Begin a chant of wrath that increases the damage of all allies' smiting abilities and causes enemies to take periodic holy damage.

hymnOfSmitting.name: Hymn of Smiting
hymnOfSmitting.description: Sing a hymn that empowers your smites, causing them to splash holy damage to enemies near your target.

sacredVerse.name: Sacred Verse
sacredVerse.description: Utter a sacred verse that smites an enemy and reduces their magic resistance.

empoweringWord.name: Empowering Word
empoweringWord.description: Speak a word of power, granting an ally a significant boost to their magic power and critical strike chance.

divineResonance.name: Divine Resonance
divineResonance.description: Strike a foe with a resonating smite. The holy energy then resonates, healing a nearby ally.

battleCanticle.name: Battle Canticle
battleCanticle.description: Begin a battle canticle that increases all allies' attack speed and accuracy.

holyMelody.name: Holy Melody
holyMelody.description: A holy melody that soothes the spirit, granting an ally mana regeneration.

echoingJudgment.name: Echoing Judgment
echoingJudgment.description: Smite an enemy with a judgment that echoes, striking them again for less damage after a short delay.

purgeEvilSmite.name: Purge Evil
purgeEvilSmite.description: A smite that purges a beneficial magic effect from the target.

cleansingFlame.name: Cleansing Flame
cleansingFlame.description: Unleash a wave of cleansing flame that damages enemies and purges a debuff from allies.

lightOfPurity.name: Light of Purity
lightOfPurity.description: Bathe an ally in pure light, healing them and removing all poison and disease effects.

unmakeCorruption.name: Unmake Corruption
unmakeCorruption.description: Attempt to unmake the corruption in a foe, dealing damage and stripping them of an Unholy or Shadow-based buff.

holyBanishment.name: Holy Banishment
holyBanishment.description: Attempt to banish a summoned enemy minion from the battlefield.

sanctifiedGround.name: Sanctified Ground
sanctifiedGround.description: Sanctify a patch of ground. Allies standing on it are immune to curses, while Undead enemies are damaged.

divineRebuke.name: Divine Rebuke
divineRebuke.description: Rebuke an enemy for using dark magic. If the target has a Shadow or Necrotic buff, this deals bonus damage.

sealOfLight.name: Seal of Light
sealOfLight.description: Place a Seal of Light on an enemy. When allies attack this enemy, they have a chance to be healed.

exorciseEvil.name: Exorcise Evil
exorciseEvil.description: Attempt to exorcise the evil from a target, dealing high Holy damage. Deals massive bonus damage to Undead and Demons.

smiteUndead.name: Smite Undead
smiteUndead.description: A powerful smite specifically tuned to destroy the undead. Has a chance to instantly destroy weaker undead creatures.

holyInquisition.name: Holy Inquisition
holyInquisition.description: Begin an inquisition on a target, dealing damage and revealing them, preventing stealth and invisibility.

banishDemon.name: Banish Demon
banishDemon.description: Attempt to banish a demonic entity, removing it from combat for a long duration. Less effective on stronger demons.

consecratedWeapon.name: Consecrated Weapon
consecratedWeapon.description: Consecrate an ally's weapon, causing their attacks to deal bonus Holy damage, especially to Undead and Demons.

righteousVerdict.name: Righteous Verdict
righteousVerdict.description: Deliver a final verdict on an unholy foe, dealing immense damage. If this kills the target, nearby allies are inspired.

auraOfPurity.name: Aura of Purity
auraOfPurity.description: Project an aura of purity that damages nearby Undead and Demon enemies and grants allies resistance to their attacks.

judgmentHammer.name: Judgment Hammer
judgmentHammer.description: Summon a spiritual hammer to strike a foe, dealing Holy damage and stunning them.

soulSmite.name: Soul Smite
soulSmite.description: A smite that strikes the soul, dealing Holy damage and reducing the target's mana.

bindSoulEnemy.name: Bind Soul
bindSoulEnemy.description: Bind an enemy's soul. For a duration, a portion of damage they deal is also inflicted upon themselves.

protectiveSoulLink.name: Protective Soul Link
protectiveSoulLink.description: Link your soul with an ally's. For a duration, you share damage taken, and both of you gain increased armor.

soulShepherd.name: Soul Shepherd
soulShepherd.description: Guide the souls of your allies, granting them a blessing that increases their resistance to Fear and Charm.

spiritualJudgment.name: Spiritual Judgment
spiritualJudgment.description: A smite that judges the spirit, dealing bonus damage to enemies with active buffs.

condemnSoul.name: Condemn Soul
condemnSoul.description: Condemn an enemy's soul, preventing them from being healed or resurrected for a duration.

etherealGuardian.name: Ethereal Guardian
etherealGuardian.description: Summon an ethereal guardian to protect an ally. The guardian will take a portion of the damage intended for that ally.

releaseSoulEnergy.name: Release Soul Energy
releaseSoulEnergy.description: Release stored soul energy, healing all allies and damaging all enemies in a large radius. Power is increased by the number of active Soulbinds.

blessingOfVitality.name: Blessing of Vitality
blessingOfVitality.description: Bless an ally with immense vitality, greatly increasing their maximum health for a duration.

greaterRestoration.name: Greater Restoration
greaterRestoration.description: A powerful prayer that heals for a large amount and removes all major curses and diseases from a target.

prayerOfMending.name: Prayer of Mending
prayerOfMending.description: A prayer that heals an ally and then jumps to another nearby injured ally, healing them for a smaller amount. Can jump up to 3 times.

miracleHeal.name: Miracle
miracleHeal.description: Perform a miracle, healing a single ally for a massive amount. Has a very long cooldown.

chantOfHealing.name: Chant of Healing
chantOfHealing.description: Begin a chant that heals all allies over time. The healing becomes stronger the longer the chant is maintained.

hymnOfMending.name: Hymn of Mending
hymnOfMending.description: Sing a hymn that heals a target and applies a potent heal-over-time effect.

harmonicRestoration.name: Harmonic Restoration
harmonicRestoration.description: A healing wave that resonates, healing the initial target and then bouncing to two other nearby allies.

soothingMelody.name: Soothing Melody
soothingMelody.description: A soothing melody that calms allies, reducing damage taken for a short period.

rejuvenatingVerse.name: Rejuvenating Verse
rejuvenatingVerse.description: Recite a verse that rejuvenates an ally, restoring both health and stamina.

songOfLife.name: Song of Life
songOfLife.description: Sing a song of life that grants all allies a regeneration effect and increases their max health.

auraOfTranquility.name: Aura of Tranquility
auraOfTranquility.description: Project an aura that calms the spirits of allies, making them resistant to control effects like stun and fear.

divineChorus.name: Divine Chorus
divineChorus.description: Lead allies in a divine chorus, healing all for a large amount and granting them immunity to debuffs for a short time.

divineShieldHeal.name: Divine Shield (Heal)
divineShieldHeal.description: Shield an ally with divine energy. When the shield expires or breaks, it releases a burst of healing.

aegisOfLight.name: Aegis of Light
aegisOfLight.description: Create a powerful aegis on an ally that completely absorbs the next incoming attack, regardless of damage.

barrierOfFaith.name: Barrier of Faith
barrierOfFaith.description: Erect a barrier of faith that grants a significant damage reduction shield to all allies.

guardianSpirit.name: Guardian Spirit
guardianSpirit.description: Call a guardian spirit to watch over an ally. If the ally takes fatal damage, they are instead healed to 50% health. The spirit is consumed in the process.

healingWard.name: Healing Ward
healingWard.description: Place a stationary healing ward on the ground that heals the most injured ally within its radius each turn.

shieldOfHope.name: Shield of Hope
shieldOfHope.description: Shield an ally with hope. The shield's strength increases based on the ally's missing health.

repelDarkness.name: Repel Darkness
repelDarkness.description: Unleash a burst of light that damages and knocks back nearby Shadow and Undead enemies.

sanctifiedAura.name: Sanctified Aura
sanctifiedAura.description: Create an aura of sanctity that increases allies' resistance to all magic.

massCleanse.name: Mass Cleanse
massCleanse.description: Cleanse all allies of up to two harmful magic debuffs.

purifyingHeal.name: Purifying Heal
purifyingHeal.description: A powerful heal that also purges a magical debuff from the target.

removeAffliction.name: Remove Affliction
removeAffliction.description: Completely remove all Poison and Disease effects from an ally.

lightOfDispelling.name: Light of Dispelling
lightOfDispelling.description: Unleash a wave of light that removes one buff from each enemy and one debuff from each ally.

sacredWash.name: Sacred Wash
sacredWash.description: Wash an ally in sacred water, healing them and making them resistant to debuffs for a short time.

restorativePurge.name: Restorative Purge
restorativePurge.description: Purge a harmful effect from an ally. The stronger the effect removed, the more the ally is healed.

auraOfPurityHeal.name: Aura of Purity (Heal)
auraOfPurityHeal.description: Project an aura that periodically cleanses a minor debuff from nearby allies.

healingTouchPurge.name: Healing Touch (Purge)
healingTouchPurge.description: A focused healing touch that also removes a physical debuff like bleed or weakness.

healingExorcism.name: Healing Exorcism
healingExorcism.description: Drive out a lesser evil spirit from a foe, dealing damage and releasing its energy to heal a nearby ally.

banishAndMend.name: Banish and Mend
banishAndMend.description: Banish a harmful magical debuff from an ally, healing them in the process.

spiritCleanse.name: Spirit Cleanse
spiritCleanse.description: Cleanse an ally's spirit, removing Fear and Charm effects and granting a heal over time.

holyRebukeHeal.name: Holy Rebuke (Heal)
holyRebukeHeal.description: Rebuke an unholy foe, dealing damage and converting some of that holy power into healing for yourself.

exorciseAffliction.name: Exorcise Affliction
exorciseAffliction.description: Perform a minor exorcism on an ally to remove a damaging debuff (Poison, Bleed, Burn) and heal them.

sanctifySoul.name: Sanctify Soul
sanctifySoul.description: Sanctify an ally's soul, making them immune to curses and granting them a protective shield.

wardAgainstPossession.name: Ward Against Possession
wardAgainstPossession.description: Ward all allies against possession, making them immune to Charm and Confusion effects.

purifyingLightHeal.name: Purifying Light (Heal)
purifyingLightHeal.description: A wave of purifying light that heals allies in a cone and removes a minor debuff.

soulLinkHeal.name: Soul Link (Heal)
soulLinkHeal.description: Link the souls of two allies. For a duration, they share a health pool and any healing received by one is shared.

spiritBond.name: Spirit Bond
spiritBond.description: Bond an ally's spirit to yours. They gain a heal-over-time effect, and you gain a mana-over-time effect.

ancestralHealing.name: Ancestral Healing
ancestralHealing.description: Call upon ancestral spirits to perform a powerful heal that repeats on the target for less effect on the next two turns.

communeWithSpirits.name: Commune with Spirits
communeWithSpirits.description: Commune with the spirits, granting you a random powerful, short-term buff (e.g., massive heal boost, mana cost reduction, or cooldown reduction).

vitalityShare.name: Vitality Share
vitalityShare.description: Even out the life force of two allies, setting both their health percentages to the average of the two.

etherealMending.name: Ethereal Mending
etherealMending.description: An ethereal heal that also makes the target partially incorporeal, increasing their dodge chance.

soulPactRestoration.name: Soul Pact Restoration
soulPactRestoration.description: Forge a soul pact with an ally. When you heal them, a portion of the healing also restores their mana.

guardianSpiritAlly.name: Guardian Spirit (Ally)
guardianSpiritAlly.description: Call a guardian spirit to watch over an ally. If the ally takes fatal damage, they are instead healed to 50% health. The spirit is consumed in the process.

blessingOfKings.name: Blessing of Kings
blessingOfKings.description: Bestow a royal blessing on all allies, increasing all their primary stats (Strength, Dexterity, Magic Power, Vitality) for a duration.

auraOfFortitude.name: Aura of Fortitude
auraOfFortitude.description: Project an aura that bolsters allies' fortitude, increasing their maximum health and damage reduction.

divineInterventionUtility.name: Divine Intervention (Utility)
divineInterventionUtility.description: Intervene on behalf of an ally, making them immune to all damage and debuffs for a short time, but they cannot act.

massDispelMagic.name: Mass Dispel Magic
massDispelMagic.description: Unleash a wave of dispelling energy, removing 1 buff from every enemy and 1 debuff from every ally.

blessingOfWisdom.name: Blessing of Wisdom
blessingOfWisdom.description: Bless an ally with divine wisdom, greatly increasing their mana regeneration.

sealOfInsight.name: Seal of Insight
sealOfInsight.description: Place a Seal of Insight on an ally. When they cast a spell, they have a chance to refund a portion of its mana cost.

prayerOfGuidance.name: Prayer of Guidance
prayerOfGuidance.description: A prayer that guides all allies, increasing their accuracy and critical hit chance.

holyGroundConsecration.name: Holy Ground Consecration
holyGroundConsecration.description: Consecrate the ground, granting allies within it a protective shield that regenerates over time.

chantOfProtection.name: Chant of Protection
chantOfProtection.description: Chant a protective verse, granting all allies increased armor and magic resistance.

hymnOfCourage.name: Hymn of Courage
hymnOfCourage.description: Sing a hymn that removes fear from an ally and makes them immune to it for a long duration.

verseOfClarity.name: Verse of Clarity
verseOfClarity.description: Recite a verse that cleanses an ally of confusion and silence effects, and increases their accuracy.

battlefieldOratory.name: Battlefield Oratory
battlefieldOratory.description: Deliver a rousing speech that grants all allies a powerful buff to a random primary stat for a duration.

demoralizingWord.name: Demoralizing Word
demoralizingWord.description: Speak a word that demoralizes an enemy, reducing their damage and armor.

songOfSwiftness.name: Song of Swiftness
songOfSwiftness.description: Sing a song that increases the speed and dodge of all allies.

auraOfResolve.name: Aura of Resolve
auraOfResolve.description: Project an aura that grants allies resistance to all control effects.

divineSpeech.name: Divine Speech
divineSpeech.description: Speak with divine authority. Enemies are silenced, allies are inspired, increasing their damage.

greaterDivineShield.name: Greater Divine Shield
greaterDivineShield.description: Create a very powerful shield on an ally that absorbs a large amount of all types of damage.

aegisOfSanctuary.name: Aegis of Sanctuary
aegisOfSanctuary.description: Shield all nearby allies, granting them a moderate damage absorption shield.

utilityBarrier.name: Utility Barrier
utilityBarrier.description: Create a barrier on an ally that absorbs damage and makes them immune to slows.

wardOfProtection.name: Ward of Protection
wardOfProtection.description: Place a stationary ward that grants increased armor to allies near it.

reflectiveShield.name: Reflective Shield
reflectiveShield.description: Shield an ally with a barrier that reflects a portion of damage back to melee attackers.

groupShield.name: Group Shield
groupShield.description: Shield all allies with a moderate protective barrier.

lightwellShield.name: Lightwell Shield
lightwellShield.description: Create a well of light. Allies can interact with it to gain a personal shield.

holyBastion.name: Holy Bastion
holyBastion.description: Become a bastion of holy light, making all nearby allies immune to critical hits and granting them high damage reduction.

massPurification.name: Mass Purification
massPurification.description: A wave of purifying energy cleanses all allies of up to 2 harmful debuffs and provides a small heal.

adjudicatorsDecree.name: Adjudicator's Decree
adjudicatorsDecree.description: Issue a decree against an enemy, stripping them of all magical buffs.

zoneOfPurity.name: Zone of Purity
zoneOfPurity.description: Create a zone of pure holy energy. Allies inside are immune to debuffs, and enemies have their buffs dispelled upon entering.

cleanseCorruption.name: Cleanse Corruption
cleanseCorruption.description: Remove a damaging DoT (like poison or bleed) from an ally and convert its remaining damage into healing.

dispelUnholyMagic.name: Dispel Unholy Magic
dispelUnholyMagic.description: Attempt to dispel an Unholy or Necrotic buff from an enemy, dealing damage if successful.

lightOfJudgmentPurge.name: Light of Judgment (Purge)
lightOfJudgmentPurge.description: A beam of light that damages an enemy and purges a buff. If a buff is purged, the light splashes to heal a nearby ally.

auraOfSanctity.name: Aura of Sanctity
auraOfSanctity.description: Create an aura that reduces the duration of debuffs on allies and buffs on enemies.

nullifyCurse.name: Nullify Curse
nullifyCurse.description: Completely nullify a curse on an ally, healing them for a small amount.

greaterExorcism.name: Greater Exorcism
greaterExorcism.description: A powerful exorcism that deals massive damage to a single Undead or Demon target.

consecrateArea.name: Consecrate Area
consecrateArea.description: Consecrate a large area, damaging Unholy enemies within and preventing them from being resurrected.

banishFiend.name: Banish Fiend
banishFiend.description: Attempt to banish a powerful demonic enemy for an extended duration. High chance of failure on very strong demons.

wardAgainstUnholy.name: Ward Against Unholy
wardAgainstUnholy.description: Place a powerful ward on an ally, granting them high resistance to Shadow and Necrotic damage.

turnGreaterUndead.name: Turn Greater Undead
turnGreaterUndead.description: Unleash a wave of divine power that causes all Undead enemies to flee in terror.

holySeal.name: Holy Seal
holySeal.description: Place a holy seal on an enemy, silencing them and preventing them from using Unholy or Shadow abilities.

divineDismissal.name: Divine Dismissal
divineDismissal.description: Attempt to dismiss a summoned creature, dealing high damage. If the target is a summoned minion, it takes massive bonus damage.

spiritAnchor.name: Spirit Anchor
spiritAnchor.description: Anchor an enemy's spirit to the ground, rooting them and making them vulnerable to Holy damage.
